GE07bhg4c04u:2: imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam /
GE07bhg4c04u:8: tad evaṃ brahmārpaṇādi-guṇa-vidhānena tattvaṃ padārtha-vivekādinā ca prapañciṣyan prathamaṃ tāvat parasparāprāptatvena stuvan bhagavān uvāca imam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:10: imaṃ yogaṃ purāham vivasvata ādityāya kathitavān /
GE07bhg4c04u:14: yadyapi pūrvam upeyatvena jñāna-yogas tad-upāyatvena ca karma-yoga iti dvau yogau
GE07bhg4c04u:15: kathitau tathāpi ekaṃ sāṅkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca paśyati sa paśyati [Gītā 5.6] ity anayā
GE07bhg4c04u:16: diśā sādhya-sādhanayoḥ phalaikyād aikyam upacarya sādhana-bhūtaṃ karma-yogaṃ sādhya-bhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:17: ca jñāna-yogam aneka-vidha-guṇa-vidhānāya stauti vaṃśa-kathanena bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c04u:18: imam adhyāya-dvayenoktaṃ yogaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaṃ karma-niṣṭhopāya-labhyaṃ vivasvate
GE07bhg4c04u:20: ahaṃ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sarva-jagat-paripālakaḥ sargādi-kāle rājñāṃ balādhānena tad-adhīnaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:22: katham anena balādhānam iti viśeṣeṇena darśayati -- avyayam avyaya-veda-mūlatvād avyaya-phalatvāc ca na vyeti sva-phalād ity avyayam avyabhicāri-phalam
GE07bhg4c04u:23: tathā caitādṛśena balādhānaṃ śakyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:24: sa ca mama śiṣyo vivasvān manave vaivasvatāya sva-putrāya prāha /
GE07bhg4c04u:26: yadyapi prati manvantaraṃ svāyambhuvādi-sādhāraṇo 'yaṃ bhāgavad-updeśas tathāpi sāmpratika-vaivasvata-manvantarābhi-prāyeṇādityam ārabhya sampradāyo gaṇitaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c04u:30: adhyāya-dvayenoktaṃ niṣkāma-karma-sādhyaṃ jñāna-yogaṃ stauti imam iti //1//
GE07bhg4c04u:36: pūrvādhyāyābhyām uktaṃ jñāna-yogaṃ karma-yogaṃ caika-phalatvād ekīkṛtya tad-vaṃśaṃ kīrtayan stauti imam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:38: avyayaṃ nityaṃ vedārtahtvān naveyeti sva-phalādityavyabhicāri-phalatvāc ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:39: sa ca mac-chiṣyo vivasvān sva-putrāya manave vaivasvatāya prāha /
GE07bhg4c04u:43: sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ parantapa //2//
GE07bhg4c04u:45: evaṃ rājānaś ca te ṛṣayaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c04u:47: sva-pitrādibhir ikṣvāku-pramukhaiḥ protkam imaṃ yogam vidur jānanti sma /
GE07bhg4c04u:48: adyatanānām ajñāne kāraṇam āha he parantapa śatru-pātana /
GE07bhg4c04u:49: sa yogaḥ kāla-vaśād iha loke naṣṭo vicchinnaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c04u:51: evam ādityam ārabhya guru-śiṣya-paramparayā prāptam imaṃ yogaṃ rājānaś ca ta ṛṣayaś
GE07bhg4c04u:52: ceti rājarṣayaḥ prabhutve sati sūkṣmārtha-nirīkṣaṇa-kṣamā nimi-pramukhāḥ sva-pitrādi-proktaṃ viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:53: tasmād anādi-veda-mūlatvenānanta-phalatvenānādi-guru-śiṣya-paramparā-prāptatvena ca kṛtrimatva-śaṅkānāspadatvān mahā-prabhāvo 'yaṃ yoga iti śraddhātiśayāya stūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:54: sa evaṃ mahā-prayojano 'pi yogaḥ kālena mahatā dīrgheṇa dharma-hrāsa-kareṇehedānīm
GE07bhg4c04u:55: āvayor vyavahāra-kāle dvāparānte durbalān ajitendriyān anadhikāriṇaḥ prāpya kāma-krodhādibhir
GE07bhg4c04u:57: taṃ vinā puruṣārthāprāpter aho daurbhāgyaṃ lokasyeti śocati bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c04u:59: paraṃ kāma-krodhādi-rūpaṃ śatru-gaṇaṃ śauryeṇa balavatā vivekena tapasā ca bhānur iva tāpayatīti parantapaḥ śatru-tāpano jitendriya ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:63: baladevaḥ : evaṃ vivasvantam ārabhya guru-śiṣya-paramparayā prāptam iimaṃ yogaṃ rājarṣayaḥ sva-pitrādibhir ikṣvāku-prabhṛtibhir upadiṣṭaṃ viduḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:66: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:67: bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:69: sa evāyaṃ yogo 'dya vicchinne sampradāye sati punaś ca te tubhyam uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:70: yatas tvaṃ mama bhakto 'si sakhā ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:74: ya evaṃ pūrvam upadiṣṭo 'py adhikārya-bhāvād vicchinna-sampradāyo 'bhūt /
GE07bhg4c04u:75: yaṃ vinā ca puruṣārtho na labhyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:76: sa evāyaṃ purātano 'nādi-guru-paramparā-gato yogo 'dya sampradāya-viccheda-kāle mayātisnigdhena te tubhyaṃ prakarṣeṇoktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:80: yasmāt tvaṃ mama bhaktaḥ śaraṇāgatatve saty atyanta-prītimān sakhā ca samāna-vayāḥ snigdha-sahāyo 'si sarvadā bhavasi atas tubhyam ukta ity arthaḥ anyasmai kuto nocyate tatrāha /
GE07bhg4c04u:81: hi yasmād etaj jñānam uttamaṃ rahasyam atigopyam //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:85: anyas tu arvācīnaṃ praty eva avaktavyatve hetū rahasyam iti //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:86: baladevaḥ : sa eva tadānupūrvika-vacana-vācyo yogo mayā tvat-sakhenātisnigdhena te
GE07bhg4c04u:87: tubhyaṃ mat-sakhāyeti snigdhāya proktas tvaṃ me bhaktaḥ prapannaḥ sakhā cāsīti hetor
GE07bhg4c04u:90: hi yasmād uttamaṃ rahasyam iti gopyam etat //3//
GE07bhg4c04u:93: aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:94: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:95: śrīdharaḥ : bhagavato vivasvantaṃ prati yogopadeśāsambhavaṃ paśyann arjuna uvāca aparam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:98: tasmāt tavādhunātanatvāt cirantanāya vivasvate tvam ādau yogaṃ proktavān iti etat katham ahaṃ jānīyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyām //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:100: yā bhagavati vāsudeve manuṣyatvenāsarvajñatvānityatvāśaṅkā mūrkhāṇāṃ tām apanetum anuvadann arjuna āśaṅkate - aparam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:101: aparam alpa-kālīnam idānantanaṃ vasudeva-gṛhe bhavato janma śarīra-grahaṇaṃ vihīnaṃ ca manuṣyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:102: paraṃ bahu-kālīnaṃ sargādi-bhavam utkṛṣṭaṃ ca devatvāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:108: tvam idānīṃtano manuṣyo 'sarvajñaḥ sargādau pūrvatanāya sarvajñāyādityāya proktavān iti viruddhārtham etad iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:110: etad dehānavacchinnasya tava dehāntarāvacchedena vādityaṃ pratyupadeṣṭṛtvam etad-dehena vā /
GE07bhg4c04u:115: tad uktam abhiyuktaiḥ janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryate iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:117: tad evaṃ dehāntareṇa sargādau sad-bhāvānupappattir ity asarvajñatvānityatvābhyāṃ dvāv arjunasya pūrva-pakṣau //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:119: uktam artham asambhavaṃ pṛcchati aparam idānīntanam /
GE07bhg4c04u:120: paraṃ purātanam ataḥ katham etat pratyemīti bhāvaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:121: baladevaḥ : kṛṣṇasya sanātanatve sārvajñe ca śaṅkamānān anabhijñān nirākartum arjuna uvāca aparam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:122: aparam arvācīnaṃ paraṃ parācīnaṃ tasmād ādhunikas tvaṃ prācīnāya vivasvate yogam uktavān ity etat katham ahaṃ vijānīyāṃ pratīyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:124: na khalu sarveśvaratvena kṛṣṇam arjuno na vetti tasya narākhya-tad-avatāratvena tādrūpyāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:125: paraṃ dhāma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi tad-ukteś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:126: na tv atat-sarvajña-viṣayām ajña-śaṅkām apākartum aparam ity ādi pṛcchati /
GE07bhg4c04u:127: sarveśvaraḥ sa yathā sva-tattvaṃ vetti na tathānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:128: tatas tan-mukhāmbujād eva tad-rūpa-taj-janmādi parkāśanīyaṃ loka-maṅgalāya /
GE07bhg4c04u:129: tad-arthaṃ sva-mahimānaṃ pravadan vikatthanatayā sa nākṣepyaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:131: tac ca manuṣākṛti-para-brahmaṇas tava rūpaṃ janmādi ca loka-vilakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:132: kiṃ-vidhaṃ kim-arthakaṃ kiṃ-kālam iti vijñasyāpy ājñavat praśno 'yam ajña-śaṅkā-nirāsaka-prativacanārthaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:135: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna /
GE07bhg4c04u:136: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha parantapa //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:137: śrīdharaḥ : rūpāntareṇopadiṣṭavān ity abhiprāyeṇottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca bahūnīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:140: tvaṃ tu na vettha na vetsi avidyāvṛttatvāt //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:142: tatra sarvajñatvena prathamasya parihāram āha bahūnīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:143: janmāni līlā-deha-grahaṇāni loka-dṛṣṭy-abhiprāyeṇādityasyodayavan me mama bahūni vyatītāni tava cājñāninaḥ karmārjitāni deha-grahaṇāni /
GE07bhg4c04u:144: tava cety upalakṣaṇam itareṣām api jīvānāṃ,
GE07bhg4c04u:148: tāni janmāny ahaṃ sarvajñaḥ sarva-śaktir īśvaro veda jānāmi sarvāṇi madīyāni tvadīyāny anyadīyāni ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:149: na tvam ajño jīvas tirobhūta-jñāna-śaktir vettha na jānāsi svīyāny api kiṃ punaḥ parakīyāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:151: paraṃ śatruṃ bheda-dṛṣṭyā parikalpya hantuṃ pravṛtto 'sīti viparīta-darśitatvād bhrānto 'sīti sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c04u:152: tad anena sambodhana-dvayenāvaraṇa-vikṣepau dvāv apy ajñāna-dharmau darśitau //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:155: tava ceti yadā yadaiva mamāvatāras tadā mat-pārṣadatvāt tavāpy āvirbhāvo 'bhūd evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:157: tvaṃ na vettha mayaiva sva-līlā-siddhy-arthaṃ tvaj-jñānāvaraṇād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:160: baladevaḥ : eka evāhaṃ eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti ity ādi śruty-uktāni nitya-siddhāni
GE07bhg4c04u:161: bahūni rūpāṇi vaidūryavad ātmani dadhānaḥ purā rūpāntareṇa taṃ pratyupadiṣṭavān iti
GE07bhg4c04u:163: tava ceti mat-sakhatvāt tāvanti janmāni tavāpy abhūvann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:165: idānīṃ mayaivācintya-śaktyā sva-līlā-siddhaye tvaj-jñānācchādanād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:168: bahūnītyādi śrī-mukhoktes tava ceti dṛṣṭāntāc ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:169: na ca janmākhyo vikāras tasyāgrima-vyākhyayā pratyākhyānāt //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:171: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san /
GE07bhg4c04u:173: śrīdharaḥ : nanu anādes tava kuto janma ?
GE07bhg4c04u:174: avināśinaś ca kathaṃ punar janma yena bahūni me vyatītānity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:175: īśvarasya tava puṇya-pāpa-vihīnasya kathaṃ jīvavaj janmeti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:182: nanu tathāpi ṣoḍaśa-kalātamka-liṅga-deha-śūnyasya ca tava kuto janmeti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:183: ata uktaṃ svāṃ śuddha-sattvātmikāṃ prakṛtiṃ adhiṣṭhāya svīkṛtya /
GE07bhg4c04u:186: nanv atītāneka-janma-vattvam ātmanaḥ smarasi cet tarhi jāti-smaro jīvas tvaṃ para-janma-jñānam
GE07bhg4c04u:187: api yoginaḥ sārvātmyābhimānena śāstra-dṛṣṭyā tūpadeśo vāma-devavat [Vs 1.1.30] iti
GE07bhg4c04u:189: tathā cāha vāmadevo jīvo 'pi ahaṃ manur abhavaṃ sūryaś cāhaṃ kakṣīvānṛpir asmi vipraḥity ādi dāśatayyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:191: tathā ca katham ādityaṃ sarvajñam upadiṣṭavān asy anīśvaraḥ san /
GE07bhg4c04u:192: na hi jīvasya mukhyaṃ sārvajñyaṃ sambhavati vyaṣṭy-upādheḥ paricchinnatvena sarva-sambandhitvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:193: samaṣṭy-upādher api virājaḥ sthūla-bhūtopādhitvena sūkṣma-bhūta-pariṇāma-viṣayaṃ māyā-pariṇāma-viṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ na sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:196: tasmād īśvara eva kāraṇopāditvād atītān āgata-vartamāna-sarvārtha-viṣaya-jñānavān mukhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:197: atītān āgata-vartamāna-viṣayaṃ māyā-vṛtti-trayam ekaiva vā sarva-viṣayā māyā-vṛttir ity anyat /
GE07bhg4c04u:198: tasya ca nityeśvarasya sarvajñasya dharmādharmādy-abhāvena janmaivānupapannam atītāneka-janmavattvaṃ tu dūrotsāritam eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:199: tathā ca jīvatve sārvajñyānupapattir īśvaratve ca deha-grahaṇānupapattir iti śaṅkā-dvayaṃ pariharann anityatva-pakṣasyāpi parihāram āha ajo 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:202: yad ubhayaṃ tārkikaiḥ prety abhāva ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:203: tad uktaṃ jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca [Gītā 2.27] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:205: dharmādharma-vaśatvaṃ cājñasya jīvasaya dehābhimāninaḥ karmādhikāritvād bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:206: tatra yad ucyate sarvajñasyeśvarasya sarva-kāraṇasyedṛg-deha-grahaṇaṃ nopapadyata iti tat tathaiva /
GE07bhg4c04u:207: katham ? yadi tasya śarīraṃ sthūla-bhūta-kāryaṃ syāt tadā vyaṣṭi-rūpatve jāgrad-avasthāsmad-ādi-tulyatvam /
GE07bhg4c04u:213: na ca jīvāviṣṭa eva tādṛśe śarīre tasya bhūtāveśavat praveśa iti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:214: tac-charīrāvacchedena taj-jīvasya bhogābhyupagame 'ntaryāmi-rūpeṇa sarva-śarīra-praveśasya vidyamānatvena śarīra-viśeṣābhyupagama-vaiyarthyāt
GE07bhg4c04u:216: ato na bhautikaṃ śarīram īśvarasyeti pūrvārdhenāṅgīkaroti -- ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi sann iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:217: ajo 'pi sann ity apūrva-deha-grahaṇam avyayātmāpi sann iti pūrva-deha-vicchedaṃ bhūtānāṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:218: bhagava-dharmāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ brahmādi-stamba-paryantānām īśvaro 'pi sann iti dharmādharma-vaśatvaṃ nivārayati /
GE07bhg4c04u:219: kathaṃ tarhi deha-grahaṇam ity uttarārdhenāha prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya sambhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:220: prakṛtiṃ māyākhyāṃ vicitrāneka-śaktim aghaṭamāna-ghaṭanāpaṭīyasīṃ svāṃ svopādi-bhūtām
GE07bhg4c04u:221: adhiṣṭhāya cid-ābhāsena vaśīkṛtya sambhavāmi tat-pariṇāma-viśeṣair eva jagat-kāraṇatva-sampādikā
GE07bhg4c04u:222: mad-icchayaiva pravartamānā viśuddha-sattva-mayatvena mama mūrtis tad-viśiṣṭasya
GE07bhg4c04u:224: ato 'nena nityenaiva dehena vivasvantaṃ ca tvāṃ ca pratīmaṃ yogam upadiṣṭavān aham ity upapannam /
GE07bhg4c04u:225: tathā ca śrutiḥ - ākāśa-śarīraṃ brahma iti / ākāśo
GE07bhg4c04u:227: ākāśa eva tad otaṃ ca protaṃ ca [BAU 3.8.7] ity ādau tathā darśanāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:229: tarhi bhautika-vigrahābhāvāt tad-dharma-manuṣyatvādi-pratītiḥ katham iti cet tatrāha ātma-māyayeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:230: man-māyayaiva mayi manuṣyatvādi-pratītir lokānugrahāya na tu vastu-vṛttyeti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:232: māyā hy eṣā mayā sṛṣṭā yan māṃ paśyasi nārada /
GE07bhg4c04u:233: sarva-bhūta-guṇair yuktaṃ na tu māṃ draṣṭum arhasi // [Mbh 12.326.43] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:234: sarva-bhūta-guṇair yuktaṃ kāraṇopādhiṃ māṃ carma-cakṣuṣā draṣṭuṃ nārhasīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:235: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa - sa ca bhagavān jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:236: sadā sampannas triguṇātmikāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ svāṃ māyāṃ prakṛtiṃ vaśīkṛtyājo 'vyayo bhūtānām
GE07bhg4c04u:237: īśvaro nitya-śuddha-buddha-mukta-svabhāvo 'pi san sva-māyayā dehavān iva jāta iva
GE07bhg4c04u:238: ca lokānugrahaṃ kurvan lakṣyate sva-prayojanābhāve 'pi bhūtānujighṛkṣayā iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:239: vyākhyātṛbhiś coktaṃ svecchā-vinirmitena māyāmayena divyena rūpeṇa sambabhūveti /
GE07bhg4c04u:241: sa eva bhagavad-deha iti bhāṣya-kṛtāṃ matam //
GE07bhg4c04u:242: anye tu parameśvare deha-dehi-bhāvaṃ na manyante /
GE07bhg4c04u:243: kiṃ yaś ca nityo vibhuḥ sac-cid-ānanda-ghano bhagavān vāsudevaḥ paripūrṇo nirguṇaḥ paramātmā sa eva tad-vigraho nānyaḥ kaścid bhautiko māyiko veti /
GE07bhg4c04u:244: asmin pakṣe yojanā - ākāśavat sarva-gataś ca nityaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:245: avināśī vā are 'yam ātmānucchitti-dharmā ity ādi śruteḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:247: nātmāśruter nityatvāc ca tābhyaḥ [Vs. 2.3.16] ity ādi nyāyāc ca vastu-gatyā janma-vināśa-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:248: sarva-bhāsakaḥ sarva-kāraṇa-māyādhiṣṭhānatvena sarva-bhūteśvaro 'pi sann ahaṃ prakṛtiṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:252: sa bhagavaḥ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni [ChāU 7.24.1] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:253: sva-svarūpam adhiṣṭhāya svarūpāvasthita eva san sambhavāmi deha-dehi-bhāvam antareṇaiva dehivad vyavaharāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:254: kathaṃ tarhy adehe sac-cid-ānanda-ghane dehatva-pratītir ata āha ātma-māyayeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:255: nirguṇe śuddhe sac-cid-ānanda-ghane mayi bhagavati vāsudeve deha-dehi-bhāva-śūnye tad-rūpeṇa pratītir māyā-mātram ity arthaḥ / tad uktam -
GE07bhg4c04u:256: kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhilātmanām /
GE07bhg4c04u:257: jagad-dhitāya so 'py atra dehīvābhāti māyayā // iti [BhP 10.14.55]
GE07bhg4c04u:259: yan-mitraṃ paramānandaṃ pūrṇaṃ brahma sanātanam // [BhP 11.14.32] iti ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:260: kecit tu nityasya niravayavasya nirvikārasyāpi paramānandasyāvayavāya-vibhāvaṃ vāstavam evecchanti te niryuktikaṃ bruvāṇas tu nāsmābhir vinivāryate iti nyāyena nāpavādyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:261: yadi sambhavet tathaivāstu kim atipallavitenety uparamyate //5//
GE07bhg4c04u:263: svasya janma-prakāram āha - ajo 'pi janma-rahito 'pi san sambhavāmi,
GE07bhg4c04u:266: jīvo 'pi vastuto 'ja eva sthūla-deha-nāśānantaraṃ jāyata eva ?
GE07bhg4c04u:270: mama tv īśvaratvāt sva-dehābhinnasyājatvaṃ janmavattvam ity ubhayam api svarūpa-siddham /
GE07bhg4c04u:271: tac ca durghaṭatvāt citram atarkyam eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:272: ataḥ puṇya-pāpādimato jīvasyeva sad-asad-yoniṣu na me janmāśaṅkety āha - bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san karma-pāratantrya-rahito 'pi bhūtvety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:273: nanu jīvo hi liṅga-śarīreṇa sva-bandhakena karma-prāpyān devādi-dehān prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c04u:275: bahu syām iti śruteḥ sarva-jagad-rūpo bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:276: tad api yad viśeṣata evambhūto 'py ahaṃ sambhavāmīti brūṣe,
GE07bhg4c04u:277: tan manye sarva-jagad-vilakṣaṇān deha-viśeṣān nityān eva loke prakāśayituṃ tvaj-janmety avagamyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:278: tat khalu katham ity ata āha prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāyeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:279: atra prakṛti-śabdena yadi bahiraṅgā māyā-śaktir ucyate,
GE07bhg4c04u:280: tadā tad-adhiṣṭhātā parameśvaras tad-dvārā jagad-rūpo bhavaty eveti na viśeṣopalabdhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:281: tasmāt saṃsiddhi-prakṛtī tv ime svarūpaṃ ca svabhāvaś ca ity abhidhānād atra prakṛti-śabdena svarūpam evocyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:286: prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ svam eva svabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya svarūpeṇa svecchayā sambhavāmīty arthaḥ iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:288: māyāṃ vyāvartayati svām iti nija-svarūpam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:289: sa bhagavaṃ kasmin pratiṣṭhitaḥ sva-mahimni iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:290: sva-svarūpam adhiṣṭhāya svarūpāvasthita eva sambhavāmi deha-dehi-bhāvam antareṇaiva dehivad vyavaharāmi iti śrī-madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:291: nanu yady avyayātmā anaśvara-matsya-kūrmādi-svarūpa eva bhavasi,
GE07bhg4c04u:292: tarhi tava prādurbhavat-svarūpaṃ pūrva-prādurbhūta-svarūpāṇi ca yugapad eva kiṃ nopalabhyanta ?
GE07bhg4c04u:293: tatrāha ātma-bhūtā yā māyā tayā sva-svarūpāvaraṇa-prakāśana-karma ca yayā cic-chakti-vṛttyāyoga-māyayety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:294: tayā hi pūrva-kālāvatīrṇa-svarūpāṇi pūrvam evāvṛtya vartamāna-svarūpaṃ prakāśya sambhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:295: ātma-māyayā samyag apracyuta-jñāna-bala-vīryādi-śaktyaiva bhavāmi iti śrī-svāmi-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:296: ātma-māyayātma-jñānena māyā vayunaṃ jñānam iti jñāna-paryāyo 'tra māyā-śabdaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:297: tathā cābhiyukta-prayogaḥ māyayā satataṃ vetti prācīnānāṃ śubhāśubham iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:298: mayi bhagavati vāsudeve deha-dehi-bhāva-śūnye tad-rūpeṇa pratītiḥ māyā-mātram iti śrī-madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c04u:299: baladevaḥ : loka-vilakṣaṇatayā svarūpaṃ sva-janma ca vadan sanātanatvaṃ svasyāha ajo 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:301: svāṃ prakṛtiṃ svaṃ svarūpaṃ adhiṣṭhāyālambya sambhavāmi āvirbhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:303: svarūpaṃ ca svabhāvaś ca ity amaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:305: etam arthaṃ vicarituṃ viśinaṣṭi ajo 'pīty ādinā /
GE07bhg4c04u:309: avyayātmāpi san avyayaḥ pariṇāma-śūnya ātmā buddhyādir yasya tādṛśa eva san /
GE07bhg4c04u:311: bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san svetareṣāṃ jīvānāṃ niyantaiva san ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:312: ajatvādi-guṇakaṃ yad vibhu-jñāna-sukha-ghanaṃ rūpaṃ tenaivāvatarāmīti svarūpeṇaiva sambhavāmīty asya vivaraṇaṃ tādṛśasya svarūpasya raver ivābhiyakti-mātram
GE07bhg4c04u:313: eva janmeti tat-svarūpasya taj-janmanaś ca loka-vilakṣaṇatvaṃ tena sanātanatvaṃ ca vyaktam /
GE07bhg4c04u:315: śrutiś caivam āha ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:316: smṛtiś ca pratyakṣaṃ ca harer janma na vikāraḥ kathaṃcana ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c04u:317: ataeva sūtikā-gṛhe divyāyudha-bhūṣaṇasya divya-rūpasya ṣaḍ-aiśvarya-sampannasya tasya vīkṣaṇaṃ smaryate /
GE07bhg4c04u:320: māyā dambhe kṛpāyāṃ ca iti viśvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:322: māyā vayunaṃ jñānaṃ ca iti nirghaṇṭu-koṣāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:323: lokaḥ khalu rājādiḥ pūrva-dehādīni vihāyāpūrva-dehādīni bhajan niranusandhir ajño janmībhavati tad-vailakṣaṇyaṃ harer janminaḥ prasphuṭam /
GE07bhg4c04u:324: bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi sann ity anena labdha-siddhayo yogi-prabhṛtayo
GE07bhg4c04u:326: sukha-cid-ghano harir deha-dehi-bhedena guṇa-guṇi-bhedena ca śūnyo 'pi viśeṣa-balāt tat-tad-bhāvena viduṣāṃ pratītir āsīd iti //6//
GE07bhg4c04u:328: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata /
GE07bhg4c04u:330: śrīdharaḥ : kadā sambhavasīty apekṣāyām āha yadā yadeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:334: evaṃ sac-cid-ānanda-ghanasya tava kadā kim-arthaṃ vā dehivad vyavahāra iti tatrocyate yadā yadeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:336: varṇāśrama-tad-ācāra-vyaṅgyasya yadā yadā glānir hānir bhavati he bhārata bharata-vaṃśodbhavatvena
GE07bhg4c04u:337: bhā jñānaṃ tatra ratatvena vā tvaṃ na dharma-hāniṃ soḍhuṃ śaknoṣīti sambodhanārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:338: evaṃ yadā yadābhyutthānam udbhavo 'dharmasya veda-niṣiddhasya nānā-vidha-duḥkha-sādhanasya
GE07bhg4c04u:339: dharma-virodhinas tadā tadātmānaṃ dehaṃ sṛjāmi nitya-siddham eva sṛṣṭam iva darśayāmi māyayā //7 //
GE07bhg4c04u:342: dharmasya glānir hānir adharmasyābhyutthānaṃ vṛddhis te dve soḍhum aśaknuvan tayor vaiparītyaṃ kartum iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:343: ātmānaṃ dehaṃ sṛjāmi nity siddham eva taṃ sṛṣṭam iva darśayāmi māyayā iti śrī-madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c04u:345: dharmasya vedoktasya glānir vināśaḥ adharmasya tad-viruddhasyābhyutthānam abhuyudayas tadāham ātmānaṃ sṛjāmi prakaṭayāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:346: na tu nirmame tasya pūrva-siddhatvād iti nāsti mat-sambhava-kāla-niyamaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c04u:355: evaṃ dharma-saṃsthāpanārthāya sādhu-rakṣaṇena duṣṭa-vadhena ca dharmaṃ sthirīkartum /
GE07bhg4c04u:357: na caivaṃ duṣṭa-nigrahaṃ kurvato 'pi nairghṛṇyaṃ śaṅkanīyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:358: yathāhuḥ - lālane tāḍane mātur nākāruṇyaṃ yathārbhake /
GE07bhg4c04u:359: tat tad eva maheśasya niyantur guṇa-doṣayoḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c04u:361: tat kiṃ dharmasya hānir adharmasya ca vṛddhis tava paritoṣa-kāraṇaṃ yena tasminn eva kāla āvirbhavasīti tathā cānarthāvaha eva tavāvatāraḥ syāt
GE07bhg4c04u:363: dharma-hānyā hīyamānānāṃ sādhūnāṃ puṇya-kāriṇāṃ veda-mārga-sthānāṃ paritrāṇāya paritaḥ sarvato rakṣaṇāya /
GE07bhg4c04u:364: tathādharma-vṛddhyā vardhamānānāṃ duṣkṛtāṃ pāpa-kāriṇāṃ veda-mārga-virodhināṃ vināśāya ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:365: tad ubhayaṃ kathaṃ syād iti tad āha dharma-saṃsthāpanārthāya dharmasya samyag-adharma-nivāraṇena
GE07bhg4c04u:366: sthāpanaṃ veda-mārga-parirakṣaṇaṃ dharma-saṃsthāpanaṃ tad-arthaṃ sambhavāmi pūrvavat /
GE07bhg4c04u:369: nanu tvad-bhaktā rājarṣayo brahmarṣayo 'pi vā dharma-hāny-adharma-vṛddhī dūrīkartuṃ śaknuvanty eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:372: anyad api anya-duṣkaraṃ karma kartuṃ sambhavāmīty āha parīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:373: sādhūnāṃ paritrāṇāya mad-ekānta-bhaktānāṃ mad-darśanotkaṇṭhā-sphuṭa-cittānāṃ yad vaiyāgrya-rūpaṃ duḥkham /
GE07bhg4c04u:375: tathā duṣkṛtāṃ mad-bhakta-loka-duḥkha-dāyināṃ mad-anyair avadhyānāṃ rāvaṇa-kaṃsa-keśy-ādīnāṃ vināśāya /
GE07bhg4c04u:376: tathā dharma-saṃsthāpanārthāya madīya-dhyāna-yajana-paricaryā-saṅkīrtana-lakṣaṇaṃ parama-dharmaṃ mad-anyaiḥ pravartayitum aśakyaṃ samyak prakāreṇa sthāpayitum ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:380: duṣṭānām apy asurāṇāṃ sva-kartṛ-vadhena vividha-duṣkṛta-phalān naraka-saha-praṇipātāt saṃsārāc ca paritrāṇatas tasya sa khalu nigraho 'py anugraha eva nirṇītaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c04u:381: baladevaḥ : nanu tvad-bhaktā rājarṣayo 'pi dharma-glānim adharmābhyutthānaṃ cāpanetuṃ prabhavanti tāvate 'rthāya kiṃ sambhavāmīty āha parīti
GE07bhg4c04u:382: sādhūnāṃ mad-rūpa-guṇa-niratānāṃ mat-sākṣāt-kāram ākāṅkṣyatāṃ tena vinātivyagrāṇāṃ tad-vaiyagrya-rūpād duḥkhāt paritrāṇāyātimanojña-svarūpa-sākṣāt-kāreṇa
GE07bhg4c04u:383: tathā duṣkṛtāṃ duṣṭa-karma-kāriṇāṃ mad-anyair avadhyānāṃ daśagrīva-kaṃsādīnāṃ tādṛg-bhakta-drohiṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:385: mad-itaraiḥ pracārayitum aśakyasya saṃsthāpanārthāya sampracārāyety etat trayaṃ mat-sambhavasya kāraṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:386: yuge yuge tat-tat-samayena ca duṣṭa-vadhena harau vaiṣamyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c04u:390: janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:391: tyaktvā dehaṃ punar janma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna //9//
GE07bhg4c04u:392: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ-vidhānām īśvara-janma-karmaṇāṃ jñāne phalam āha janmeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:393: svecchayā kṛtaṃ mama janma karma ca dharma-pālana-rūpaṃ divyam alaukikaṃ tattvataḥ parānugrahārtham eveti yo vetti sa dehābhimānaṃ tyaktvā punar janma saṃsāraṃ naiti na prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c04u:396: janma nitya-siddhasyaiva mama sac-cid-ānanda-ghanasya līlayā tathānukaraṇam /
GE07bhg4c04u:397: karma ca dharma-saṃsthāpanena jagat-paripālanaṃ me mama nitya-siddheśvarasya divyam aprākṛtam anyaiḥ kartum aśakyam īśvarasyaivāsādharaṇam /
GE07bhg4c04u:398: evam ajo 'pi sann ity ādinā pratipāditaṃ yo vetti tattvato bhrama-nivartanena /
GE07bhg4c04u:399: mūḍhair hi mauṣyatva-bhrāntyā bhagavato 'pi garbha-vāsādi-rūpam eva janma sva-bhogārtham eva karmety āropitam /
GE07bhg4c04u:401: akartur api parānugrahāya karmānukaraṇam iy evaṃ yo vetti sa ātmano 'pi tattva-sphuraṇāt
GE07bhg4c04u:402: tyaktvā deham imaṃ punar janma naiti /
GE07bhg4c04u:403: kintu māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam eva sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam eti saṃsārān mucyata ity arthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c04u:405: ukta-lakṣaṇasya maj-janmanas tathā janmānantaraṃ mat-karmaṇaś ca tattvato jñāna-mātreṇaiva kṛtārthaḥ syād ity āha janmeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:406: divyam aprākṛtaṃ iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ śrī-madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādāś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:408: lokānāṃ prakṛti-sṛṣṭatvād alaukika-śabdasya aprākṛtatvam evārthas teṣām apy abhipretaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:410: tac ca bhagavat-sandarbhe na vidyate yasya ca janma karma vā [BhP 8.3.8] ity atra śloke śrī-jīva-gosvāmi-caraṇair upapāditam /
GE07bhg4c04u:411: yad vā yukty-anupapannam api śruti-smṛti-vākya-balād atarkam evedaṃ mantavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:412: tatra pippalāda-śākhāyāṃ puruṣa-bodhinī-śrutiḥ - eko devo nitya-līlānurakto bhakta-vyāpī bhakta-hṛdayāntarātmā iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:415: evaṃ yo vetti tattvata iti ajo 'pi sann avyayatātmā ity asmiṃs tathā janma karma ca me divyam ity asmiṃś ca mad-vākya evāstikatayā maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvam eva yo jānāti,
GE07bhg4c04u:416: na tu tayor nityatve kāñcid yuktim apy apekṣamāṇo bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:417: yad vā tattvataḥ oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ [Gītā 17.18] ity
GE07bhg4c04u:418: agrimoktes tac-chabdena brahmocyate tasya bhāvas tattvaṃ tena brahma-svarūpatvena yo vettīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:419: sa vartamānaṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā punar janma naiti kintu mām evaiti /
GE07bhg4c04u:420: atra dehaṃ tyaktvā ity asyādhikyād evaṃ vyācakṣate sma /
GE07bhg4c04u:421: sa dehaṃ tyaktvā punar janma naiti kintu deham atyaktvaiva mām eti /
GE07bhg4c04u:423: āśritya mad-eka-priyo mad-eka-citto mām eva prāpnoti iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c04u:424: baladevaḥ : bahulāyāsaiḥ sādhana-sahasrair api durlabho mokṣo maj-janma-carita-śravaṇena
GE07bhg4c04u:425: mad-ekānti-pathānuvartināṃ sulabho 'stv ity etad arthaṃ ca sambhavāmīty āśayā bhagavān āha janmeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:427: tatra tatrokta-lakṣṇaṃ janma tathā karma ca tat-tad-bhakta-sambandhaṃ caritaṃ tad
GE07bhg4c04u:428: ubhayaṃ divyam aprākṛtaṃ nityaṃ bhavatīty evam evaitad iti yas tattvato vetti yad
GE07bhg4c04u:429: gataṃ bhavac ca bhaviṣyac ca eko devo nitya-līlānurakto bhakta-vyāpī bhakta-hṛdy
GE07bhg4c04u:430: antarātmā iti śrutyā divyam iti mad-uktyā ca dṛḍha-śraddho yukti-nirapekṣaḥ san /
GE07bhg4c04u:432: sa vartamānaṃ dehaṃ tyaktvā punaḥ prāpañcikaṃ janma naiti /
GE07bhg4c04u:433: kintu mām eva tat-tat-karma-manojñam eti mukto bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:434: yad vā mocakatva-liṅgena tat tvam asi iti śruteś ca me janma-karmaṇī
GE07bhg4c04u:436: itarathā tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya [ŚvetU 3.8] iti śrutir vyākupyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:438: janmādi-nityatāyāṃ yuktayas tv anyatra vistṛtā draṣṭavyāḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c04u:442: śrīdharaḥ : kathaṃ janma-karma-jñānena tvat-prāptiḥ syād iti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:444: ahaṃ śuddha-sattvāvatāraiḥ dharma-pālanaṃ karomīti madīyaṃ parama-kāruṇikatvaṃ jñātvā /
GE07bhg4c04u:451: na tv adhunaiva pravṛtto 'yaṃ mad-bhakti-mārga ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:452: tad evaṃ tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇīty ādinā vidyāvidyopādhibhyāṃ tat-tvaṃ-padārthāv īśvara-jīvau
GE07bhg4c04u:454: śuddhasya sataś cid-aṃśena tadaikyam uktam iti draṣṭavyam //10 //
GE07bhg4c04u:456: mām eti so 'rjunety uktaṃ tatra svasya sarva-mukta-prāpyatayā puruṣārthatvam asya mokṣa-mārgasyānādi-parasparāgatatvaṃ ca darśayati vīta-rāgeti
GE07bhg4c04u:458: sarvān viṣayān parityajya jñāna-mārge kathaṃ jīvitavyam iti trāso bhayam /
GE07bhg4c04u:459: sarva-viṣayocchedako 'yaṃ jñāna-mārgaḥ kathaṃ hitaḥ syād iti dveṣaḥ krodhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:460: ta ete rāga-bhaya-krodhā vītā vivekena vigatā yebhyas te vīta-rāga-bhaya-krodhāḥ śuddha-sattvāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:462: bahavo 'neke jñāna-tapasā jñānam eva tapaḥ sarva-karma-kṣaya-hetutvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:463: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate iti hi vakṣyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:467: jñāna-tapasā pūtā jīvan-muktāḥ santo mad-bhāvaṃ mad-viṣayaṃ bhāvaṃ raty-ākhyaṃ premāṇam āgatā iti vā /
GE07bhg4c04u:468: teṣāṃ jñānī nitya-yuktā eka-bhaktir viśiṣyate iti hi vakṣyati //10//
GE07bhg4c04u:471: maj-janma-karma-tattva-jñāna-mātreṇaiva māṃ prāpnoty api tu prāktanā api pūrva-pūrva-kalpāvatīrṇasya mama janma-karma-tattva-jñānavanto mām āpur evety āha vīteti /
GE07bhg4c04u:472: jñānam ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ maj-janma-karmaṇos tattvato 'nubhava-rūpam eva tapas tena pūtāḥ iti śrī-rāmānujācārya-caraṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:473: yad vā, jñāne maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatva-niścayānubhave yan-nānā-kumata-kutarka-yukti-sarpī-viṣa-dāha-sahana-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:474: tathā ca śrī-rāmānuja-dhṛta-śrutiḥ - tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yoniṃ iti dhīrā dhīmanta eva tasya yoniṃ janma-prakāraṃ jānantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:475: vītās tyaktāḥ kumata-prajalpiteṣu janeṣu rāgādyā yais te na teṣu rāgaḥ prītir nāpi tebhyo bhayaṃ nāpi teṣu krodho mad-bhaktānām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:478: baladevaḥ : idānīm iva purāpi maj-janmādi-nityatā-jñānena bahūnāṃ vimuktir abhūd iti tan-nityatāṃ draḍhayitum āha vīteti /
GE07bhg4c04u:479: bahavo janā jñāna-tapasā pūtāḥ santaḥ purā mad-bhāvam āgatā ity anuṣaṅgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:480: maj-janmādi-nityatva-viṣayakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad eva duradhigama-śruti-yukti-sampādyatvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:481: tapas tasmin jñāne vā yad vividha-kumata-kutarkādi-nivāraṇa-rūpaṃ tapas tena pūtā
GE07bhg4c04u:483: mayi bhāvaṃ premāṇaṃ vidyamānatāṃ vā mat-sākṣāt-kṛtim /
GE07bhg4c04u:485: vītāḥ parityaktās tan-nityatva-virodhiṣu rāgādayo yais te,
GE07bhg4c04u:486: na teṣu rāgaṃ na bhayaṃ na ca krodhaṃ prakāśayantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:487: tatra hetuḥ - man-mayā mad-eka-niṣṭhā upāśritāḥ saṃsevamānāḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c04u:489: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham /
GE07bhg4c04u:491: śrīdharaḥ : nanu tarhi kiṃ tvayy api vaiṣamyam asti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:492: yad evaṃ tvad-eka-śaraṇānām evātmābhāvaṃ dadāsi nānyeṣāṃ sakāmānām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:494: yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā vā ye māṃ bhajante tān ahaṃ tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānena bhajāmi anugṛhṇāmi,
GE07bhg4c04u:495: na tu sakāmā māṃ vihāyendrādīn eva ye bhajante tān aham upekṣa iti mantavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:496: yataḥ sarvaśaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādi-sevakā api mamaiva vartma bhajana-mārgam anuvartante /
GE07bhg4c04u:499: nanu ye jñāna-tapasā pūtā niṣkāmās te tvad-bhāvaṃ gacchanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:500: ye tv apūtāḥ sakāmās te na gacchantīti phala-dātus tava vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye syātām iti nety āha ye yatheti /
GE07bhg4c04u:501: ya ārtā arthārthino jijñāsavo jñāninaś ca yathā yena prakāreṇa sakāmatayā niṣkāmatayā
GE07bhg4c04u:502: ca mām īśvaraṃ sarva-phala-dātāraṃ prapadyante bhajanti tāṃs tathaiva tad-apekṣita-phala-dānenaiva
GE07bhg4c04u:505: jiijñāsūn vividiṣanti yajñenety ādi-śruti-vihita-niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhātṝn jñāna-dānena jñāninaś ca mumukṣūn mokṣa-dānena na tv anya-kāmāyānyad dadāmīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:506: nanu tathāpi sva-bhaktānām eva phalaṃ dadāsi na tv anya-deva-bhaktānām iti vaiṣamyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:507: sthitam eveti nety āha mama sarvātmano vāsudevasya vartma bhajana-mārgaṃ karma-jñāna-lakṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c04u:508: anuvartante he pārtha sarvajñaḥ sarva-prakārair indrādīn apy anuvartamānā manuṣyā
GE07bhg4c04u:510: indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhuḥ ity ādi-mantra-varṇāt phalam ata upapatteḥ [Vs. 3.2.38] iti nyāyāc ca sarva-rūpeṇāpi phala-dātā bhagavān eka evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:511: tathā ca vakṣyati ye 'py anya-devatā-bhaktā [Gītā 9.23] ity ādi //11//
GE07bhg4c04u:513: nanu tvad-ekānta-bhaktāḥ kilataj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ manyanta eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:514: kecit tu jñānādi-siddhy-arthaṃ tvāṃ prapannā jñāni-prabhṛtayas tvaj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ nāpi manyanta iti tatrāha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:515: yathā yena prakāreṇa māṃ prapadyante bhajante aham api tāṃs tenaiva prakāreṇa bhajāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:517: ayam arthaḥ - ye mat-prabhor janma-karmaṇī nitye eveti manasi kurvāṇās tat-tal-līlāyām
GE07bhg4c04u:518: eva kṛta-manoratha-viśeṣā māṃ bhajantaḥ sukhayanty aham apīśvaratvāt kartum akartum
GE07bhg4c04u:519: anyathā kartum api samarthas teṣām api janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ kartuṃ tān sva-pārṣadīkṛtya
GE07bhg4c04u:520: taiḥ sārdham eva yathā-samayam avatarann antar dadhānaś ca tān pratikṣaṇam anugṛhṇann
GE07bhg4c04u:522: ye jñāni-prabhṛtayo maj-janma-karmaṇor naśvaratvaṃ mad-vigrahasya māyā-mayatvaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c04u:523: manyamānā māṃ prapadyante aham api tān punaḥ punar naśvara-janma-karmavato māyā-pāśa-patitān
GE07bhg4c04u:524: eva kurvāṇas tat-pratiphalaṃ janma-mṛtyu-duḥkham eva dadāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:525: ye tu maj-janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṃ mad-vigrahasya ca sac-cid-ānandatvaṃ manyamānā jñāninaḥ sva-jñāna-siddhy-arthaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:527: teṣāṃ sva-deha-dvaya-bhaṅgam evecchatāṃ mumukṣūṇām anaśvaraṃ brahmānandam eva sampādayan bhajana-phalam āvidyaka-janma-mṛtyu-dhvaṃsam eva dadāmi
GE07bhg4c04u:528: tasmān na kevalaṃ mad-bhaktā eva māṃ prapadyante,
GE07bhg4c04u:529: api tu sarvaśaḥ sarve 'pi manuṣyā jñāninaḥ karmiṇo yoginaś ca devatāntaropāsakāś
GE07bhg4c04u:530: ca mama vartmānuvartante mama sarva-svarūpatvāt jñāna-karmādikaṃ sarvaṃ māmakam eva
GE07bhg4c04u:532: baladevaḥ : nanu nitya-janmādi-manojñaḥ sarveśvaras tvaṃ mayāvagata-kvacittvaṅguṣṭha-mātrādir apīśvaro janmādi-śūnyaḥ śrūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:533: tat kiṃ tava tvad-upāsanasya ca vaividhyaṃ bhaved iti ced om ity āha ye yatheti /
GE07bhg4c04u:534: ye bhaktā mām ekaṃ vaidūryam iva bahu-rūpaṃ sarveśvaraṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāveneti yāvat prapadyante bhajanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:535: tān ahaṃ tādṛśas tathaiva tad-bhāvānusāriṇā rūpeṇa bhāvena ca bhajāmi sākṣāt bhavann anugṛhṇāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:537: ato mamaikasyaiva bahu-rūpasya vartma-bahu-vidham upāsana-mārgam anādi-pravṛtta-tad-upāsaka-paramparānukampitā manuṣyāḥ sarve 'nuvartante anusaranti
GE07bhg4c04u:539: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:540: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā //12//
GE07bhg4c04u:541: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi mokṣārtham eva kim iti sarve tvāṃ na bhajantīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:543: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ karma-phalaṃ kāṅkṣantaḥ prāyeneha mānuṣya-loke indrādi-devatā eva yajante /
GE07bhg4c04u:545: hi yasmāt karmajā siddhiḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:549: nanu tvām eva bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ kim iti sarve na prapadyanta iti tatrāha kāṅkṣanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:550: karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ phala-niṣpattiṃ kāṅkṣanta iha loke devatā devān indrāgny-ādyān yajante pūjayanti ajñāna-pratihatatvān na tu niṣkāmāḥ santo māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam iti śeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:551: kasmāt ? hi yasmād indrādi-devatā-yājināṃ tat-phala-kāṅkṣiṇāṃ karmajā siddhiḥ karma-janyaṃ phalaṃ kṣipraṃ śīghram eva bhavati mānuṣe loke /
GE07bhg4c04u:552: jñāna-phalaṃ tv antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sāpekṣatvān na kṣipraṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:553: mānuṣe loke karma-phalaṃ śīghraṃ bhavatīti viśeṣaṇād anya-loke 'pi varṇāśrama-dharma-vyatirikta-karma-phala-siddhir bhagavatā sūcitā /
GE07bhg4c04u:554: yatas tat tat kṣudra-phala-siddhy-arthaṃ sa-kāmā mokṣa-vimukhā anyā devatā yajante 'to na mumukṣava iva māṃ vāsudevaṃ sākṣāt te prapadyanta ity arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c04u:556: tatrāpi manuṣyeṣu madhye kāminas tu mama sākṣād-bhūtam api bhakti-mārgaṃ parihāya śīghra-phala-sādhakaṃ karma-vartmaivānuvartanta ity āha kāṅkṣanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:558: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ procya prakṛtasya niṣkāma-karmaṇo jñānākāratvaṃ vadiṣyaṃs tad anuṣṭhātuṃ viralatvam āha kāṅkṣanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:559: iha loke 'nādi-bhoga-vāsanā-niyantritāḥ prāṇinaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ paśuputrādi-phala-niṣpattiṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:560: kāṅkṣanto 'nityālpa-dān apīndrādi-devān yajante sakāmaiḥ karmabhir na tu sarva-deveśvaraṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:561: nityānanda-phala-pradam api māṃ niṣkāmais tair yajante /
GE07bhg4c04u:562: hi yasmād asmin mānuṣe loke karmajā siddhiḥ kṣipraṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:563: niṣkāma-karmārādhitān matto jñānato mokṣa-lakṣaṇā siddhis tu cireṇaiva bhavatīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:564: sarve lokā bhoga-vāsanā-grasta-sad-asad-vivekāḥ śīghra-bhogecchavas tad-arthaṃ mad-bhṛtyān devān bhajanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:565: na tu kaścit sad-asad-vivekī saṃsāra-duḥkha-vitrasta-duḥkha-nivṛttaye niṣkāma-karmabhiḥ sarva-deveśaṃ māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:569: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam //13//
GE07bhg4c04u:572: tat-kartṛṇā ca brāhmaṇādīnām uttama-madhyamādi-vaicitryaṃ kurvatas tava kathaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ nāsti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:574: catvāro varṇā eveti cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ-pratyayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:575: ayam arthaḥ -- sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:576: sattva- rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ śaurya-yuddhādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:577: rajas- tamaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ kṛṣi-vāṇijyādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:579: ity evaṃ guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś cāturvarṇyaṃ mayaiva sṛṣṭam iti satyam,
GE07bhg4c04u:580: tathāpy evaṃ tasya kartāram api phalato 'kartāram eva māṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c04u:584: śarīrārambhaka-guṇa-vaiṣamyād api na sarve samāna-svabhāvā ity āha cāturvarṇyam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:585: catvāro varṇā eva cāturvarṇyaṃ svārthe ṣyañ /
GE07bhg4c04u:586: mayeśvareṇa sṛṣṭam utpāditaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇa-vibhāgaśaḥ karma-vibhāgaśaś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:587: tathā hi sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ ca sāttvikāni śama-damādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:588: sattvopasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ ca tādṛśāni śaurya-tejaḥ-prabhṛtīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:589: tama-upasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānā vaiśyās teṣāṃ ca kṛṣy-ādīni tādṛśāni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:590: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ ca tāmasāni traivarṇika-śuśrūṣādīni karmāṇīti mānuṣe loke vyavasthitāni /
GE07bhg4c04u:591: evaṃ tarhi viṣama-svabhāva-cāturvarṇya-sraṣṭṛtena tava vaiṣamyaṃ durvāram ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c04u:592: nety āha tasya viṣama-svabhāvasya cāturvarṇyasya vyavahāra-dṛṣṭyā kartāram api māṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:596: karma-mārgas tu bandhaka iti sarva-mārga-sraṣṭari tvayi parameśvare vaiṣamyaṃ prasaktam /
GE07bhg4c04u:597: tatra nahi nahīty āha cāturvarṇyam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:600: atra sattva-pradhānā brāhmaṇās teṣāṃ śama-damādīni karmāṇi /
GE07bhg4c04u:603: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ paricaryātmakaṃ karmety evaṃ guṇa-karma-vibhāgaśo guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca vibhāgaiś catvāro varṇā mayā dharma-mārgāśritatvena sṛṣṭāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:604: kintu teṣāṃ kartāraṃ sraṣṭāram api mām akartāram asraṣṭāram eva viddhi /
GE07bhg4c04u:607: sraṣṭāram api māṃ vastutas tv asraṣṭāram /
GE07bhg4c04u:610: sraṣṭṛtve 'pi na sāmyaṃ kiṃcid evety arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c04u:611: baladevaḥ : atha niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāna-virodhi-bhoga-vāsanā-vināśa-hetum āha cāturvarṇyam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:616: tamaḥ-pradhānāḥ śūdrās teṣāṃ viprādi-trika-paricaryādīnīti guṇa-vibhāgaiḥ karma-vibhāgaiś ca vibhaktāś catvāro varṇāḥ sarveśvareṇa mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sthiti-saṃhṛtyor upalakṣaṇam etat /
GE07bhg4c04u:618: yad āha sūtrakāraḥ - janmādy asya yataḥ [Vs 1.1.2] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:619: tasya sargādeḥ kartāram api māṃ tat tat karmāntaritatvād akartāraṃ viddhīti svasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ parihṛtam
GE07bhg4c04u:620: / etat prāhāvyayaym iti sraṣṭṛtve 'pi sāmyān na vyemīty arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c04u:622: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karma-phale spṛhā /
GE07bhg4c04u:623: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:624: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva darśayann āha na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:625: karmāṇi viśva-sṛṣṭy-ādīny api māṃ na limpanty āsaktaṃ na kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:628: yataḥ karma-lepa-rahitatvena māṃ yo 'bhijānāti so 'pi karmabhir na badhyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:629: mama nirlepatve kāraṇaṃ nirahaṅkāratva-niḥspṛhatvādikaṃ jānatas tasyāpy ahaṅkārādi-śaithilyāt //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:631: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ nirahaṅkāratvena kartṛtvena kartṛtvābhimāna-hīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ na limpanti dehārambhakatvena na badhnanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:632: evaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nirākṛtya bhoktṛtvaṃ nirākaroti na me mamāpta-kāmasya karma-phale spṛhā tṛṣṇā āpta-kāmasya kā spṛhā iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:633: kartṛtvābhimāna-phala-spṛhābhyāṃ hi karmāṇi limpanti tad-abhāvān na māṃ karmāṇi limpantīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:634: evaṃ yo 'nyo 'pi mām akartāram abhoktāraṃ cātmatvenābhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate 'kartrātma-jñānena mucyata ity arthaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:639: tatra kā vārtā ity ata āha na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:640: na limpanti jīvam iva na liptīkurvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:642: parameśvaratvena svānanda-pūrṇatve 'pi loka-pravartanārtham eva me karmādi-karaṇam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:644: yas tu na jānāti sa karmabhir badhyata iti bhāvaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c04u:645: baladevaḥ : etad viśadayati na mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:646: karmāṇi viśva-sargādīni māṃ na limpanti vaiṣamyādi-doṣeṇa jīvam iva liptaṃ na kurvanti,
GE07bhg4c04u:647: yat tāni sṛjya-jīva-karma-prayuktāni na ca mat-prayuktāni na ca sargādi-karma-phale mama spṛhāsty ato na limpantīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:648: phala-spṛhayā yaḥ karmāṇi karoti sa tat-phalair lipyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:650: parjanyavan nimitta-mātraḥ san tat-karmāṇi pravartayāmīti / smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c04u:652: pradhāna-kāraṇībhūtā yato vai sṛjya-śaktayaḥ // ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c04u:653: sṛjyānāṃ deva-mānavādi-bhāva-bhājāṃ kṣetrajñānāṃ sarga-kriyāyām asau pareśo nimitta-mātram
GE07bhg4c04u:654: eva devādi-bhāva-vaicitryāṃ kāraṇībhūtās tu sṛjyānāṃ teṣāṃ prācīna-karma-śaktaya
GE07bhg4c04u:656: evam āha sūtrakṛt - vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇyena [Vs. 2.1.35] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c04u:657: evaṃ jñānasya phalam āha iti mām iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:659: sa tad-virodhibhis tad-dhetubhiḥ prācīna-karmabhir na badhyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:662: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:663: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam //15//
GE07bhg4c04u:664: śrīdharaḥ : ye yathā mām ity ādi caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ prāsaṅgikam īśvarasya vaiṣamyaṃ parihṛtya pūrvoktam eva karma-yogaṃ prapañcayitum anusmārayati evam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:665: ahaṅkārādi-rāhityena kṛtaṃ karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:666: ity evaṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api mumukṣubhiḥ sattva-śuddhy-arthaṃ pūrvataraṃ yugāntareṣv api kṛtam /
GE07bhg4c04u:667: tasmāt tvam api prathamaṃ karmaiva kuru //15//
GE07bhg4c04u:669: yato nāhaṃ kartā na me karma-phala-spṛheti jñānāt karmabhir na badhyate 'ta āha evam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:670: evam ātmano 'kartuḥ karmālepaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair atikrāntair api asmin yuge yayāti-yadu-prabhṛtibhir mumukṣubhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:671: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva kuru na tūṣṇīm āsanaṃ nāpi saṃnyāsam /
GE07bhg4c04u:672: yady atattvavit tadātma-śuddhy-arthaṃ tattva-vic cel loka-saṅgrahārtham /
GE07bhg4c04u:673: pūrvair janakādibhiḥ pūrvataram atipūrvaṃ yugāntare kṛtam /
GE07bhg4c04u:674: etenāsmin yuge 'nya-yuge ca pūrva-pūrvataraiḥ kṛtatvād avaśyaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ karmeti darśayati //15//
GE07bhg4c04u:676: evambhūtam eva māṃ jñātvā pūrvair janakādibhir api loka-pravartanārtham eva karma kṛtam //15//
GE07bhg4c04u:678: mām eva jñātvā tad-anusāribhir mac-chiṣyaiḥ pūrvair vivasvad-ādibhir mumukṣubhir niṣkāmaṃ karma kṛtam /
GE07bhg4c04u:679: tasmāt tvam api karmaiva tat kuru /
GE07bhg4c04u:681: aśuddha-cittaś cej jñāna-garbhāyai citta-śuddhyai śuddha-cittaś cel loka-saṅgrahāyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:685: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:686: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:687: śrīdharaḥ : tac ca tattvavidbhiḥ saha vicārya kartavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:692: ato yaj jñātā yad-anuṣṭhāyāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasi tat karmākarma ca tubhyam ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:694: nanu karma-viṣaye kiṃ kaścit saṃśayo 'py asti yena pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbadhnāsi ?
GE07bhg4c04u:696: nau-sthasya niṣkriyeṣv api taṭastha-vṛkṣeṣu gamana-bhrama-darśanāt tathā dūrāc cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭeṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:697: gacchatsv api puruṣeṣv agamana-bhrama-darśanāt paramārthataḥ kiṃ karma kiṃ vā paramārthato
GE07bhg4c04u:698: 'karmeti kavayo medhāvino 'py atrāsmin viṣaye mohitā mohaṃ nirṇayāsāmarthyaṃ prāptā
GE07bhg4c04u:700: tat tasmāt te tubhyam ahaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c04u:701: a-kāra-praśleṣeṇa cchedād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi prakarṣeṇa sandehocchedena vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c04u:702: yat karmākarma-svarūpaṃ jñātvā mokṣyase mukto bhaviṣyasy aśubhāt saṃsārāt //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:704: kiṃ ca karmāpi na gatānugatika-nyāyenaiva kevalaṃ vivekinā kartavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:705: kintu tasya prakāra-viśeṣaṃ jñātvaivety atas tasya prathamaṃ durjñeyatvam āha //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:706: baladevaḥ : nanu kiṃ karma-viṣayakaḥ kaścit sandeho 'py asti yataḥ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam ity atinirbandhād bravīṣīti ced asty evety āha kiṃ karmeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:707: mumukṣubhir anuṣṭheyaṃ karma kiṃ rūpaṃ syād akarma ca karmānyat tad-antargataṃ jñānaṃ ca kiṃ rūpam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:709: atrārthe kavayo dhīmanto 'pi mohitās tad-yāthātmya-nirṇayāsāmarthyān mohaṃ prāpuḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:710: ahaṃ sarveśaḥ sarvajñas te tubhyaṃ tat karma a-kāra-praśleṣād akarma ca pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvānuṣṭhāya prāpya cāśubhāt saṃsārān mokṣyase //16//
GE07bhg4c04u:712: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:713: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c04u:714: śrīdharaḥ : nanu loka-prasiddham eva karma dehādi-vyāpārātmakam /
GE07bhg4c04u:716: ataḥ katham ucyate kavayo 'py atra mohaṃ prāptā iti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:726: nanu sarva-loka-prasiddhatvād aham evaitaj jānāmi dehendriyādi-vyāpāraḥ karma tūṣṇīm āsanam akarmeti tatra kiṃ tvayā vaktavyam iti tatrāha karmaṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:727: hi yasmāt karmaṇaḥ śāstra-vihitasyāpi tattvaṃ boddhavyam asti,
GE07bhg4c04u:736: tathākarmaṇaḥ karmākaraṇasyāpi sannyāsinaḥ kīdṛśaṃ karmākaraṇaṃ śubhadam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:737: anyathā niḥśreyasaṃ kathaṃ hasta-gataṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:741: baladevaḥ : nanu kavayo 'pi mohaṃ prāpur iti cet tatrāha karmaṇo hīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:742: karmaṇo niṣkāmasya mumukṣubhir anuṣṭhātavyasya svarūpaṃ boddhavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:744: akarmaṇaś ca karma-bhinnasya jñānasya ca svarūpaṃ boddhavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:749: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:750: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna-karma-kṛt //18//
GE07bhg4c04u:751: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ karmādīnāṃ durvijñeyatvaṃ darśayann āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:752: parameśvarārādhana-lakṣaṇe karmaṇi karma-viṣaye akarma karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:754: akarmaṇi ca vihitākaraṇe karma yaḥ paśyet pratyavāyotpādakatvena bandha-hetutvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:755: manuṣyeṣu karma kurvāṇeṣu sa buddhimān vyavasāyātmaka-buddhimattvāc chreṣṭhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:759: sarvataḥ samplutodaka-sthānīye ca tasmin karmaṇi sarva-karma-phalānām antarbhāvāt
GE07bhg4c04u:760: tad evam ārurukṣoḥ karma-yogādhikārāvasthāyāṃ na karmaṇām anārambhād ity ādinokta
GE07bhg4c04u:764: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā yaḥ karmānupayoga uktas tasyāpy arthāt prapañcaḥ kṛto veditavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:765: yad ārurukṣor api karma bandhakaṃ na bhavati tad-ārūḍhasya kuto bandhakaṃ syāt ity atrāpi śloko yujyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:766: yad vā, karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vartamāne 'py ātmano dehādi-vyatirekānubhavena
GE07bhg4c04u:767: akarma svābhāvikaṃ niaṣkarmyam eva yaḥ paśyet tathā akarmaṇi ca jñāna-rahite duḥkha-buddhyā
GE07bhg4c04u:768: karmaṇāṃ tyāge karma yaḥ paśyet tasya prayatna-sādhyatvena mithyācāratvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:770: ya evambhūtaḥ sa tu sarveṣu manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:771: tatra hetuḥ - yataḥ kṛtsnāni sarvāṇi yadṛcchayā prāptāny āhārādīni karmāṇi kurvann api sa yukta eva akartrātma-jñānena samādhistha evety arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:772: anenanaiva jñāninaḥ svabhāvād āpannaṃ kalañja-bhakṣaṇādikaṃ na doṣāya /
GE07bhg4c04u:773: ajñasya tu rāgataḥ kṛtaṃ doṣāya iti vikarmaṇo 'pi tattvaṃ nirūpitaṃ draṣṭavyam //18//
GE07bhg4c04u:775: kīdṛśaṃ tarhi karmādīnāṃ tattvam iti tad āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:776: karmaṇi dehendriyādi-vyāpāre vihite pratiṣiddhe cāhaṃ karomīti dharmy-adhyāsenātmany āropit /
GE07bhg4c04u:777: nau-sthenācalatsu taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣu samāropite calana ivākartātma-svarūpālocanena vastutaḥ karmābhāvaṃ taṭastha-vṛkṣādiṣv iva yaḥ paśyet paśyati
GE07bhg4c04u:778: tathā dehendriyādiṣu triguṇa-māyā-pariṇāmatvena sarvadā savyāpāreṣu nirvyāpāras tūṣṇīṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:779: sukham āsa ity abhimānena samāropite 'karmaṇi vyāpāroparame dūrastha-cakṣuḥ-saṃnikṛṣṭa-puruṣeṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:780: gacchatsv apy agamana iva sarvadā sa-vyāpāra-dehendriyādi-svarūpa-paryālocanena vastu-gatyā
GE07bhg4c04u:781: karma nivṛttyākhya-prayatna-rūpaṃ vyāpāraṃ yaḥ paśyed udāhṛta-puruṣeṣu gamanam iva /
GE07bhg4c04u:784: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī sa buddhimān ity ādinā buddhimattva-yoga-yuktatva-sarva-karma-kṛttvais tribhir dharmaiḥ stūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:785: atra prathama-pādena karma-vikarmaṇos tattvaṃ karma-śabdasya vihita-pratiṣiddha-paratvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:786: dvitīya-pādena cākarmaṇas tattvaṃ darśitam iti draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c04u:787: tatra yat tvaṃ manyase karmaṇo bandha-hetutvāt tūṣṇīm eva mayā sukhena sthātavyam iti tan mṛṣā /
GE07bhg4c04u:788: asati kartṛtvābhimāne vihitasya pratiṣiddhasya vā karmaṇo bandha-hetutvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:789: tathā ca vyākhyātaṃ na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti [Gītā 4.14] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c04u:790: satica kartṛtvābhimāne tūṣṇīm aham āsa ity audāsīnyābhimānātmakaṃ yat karma tad api bandha-hetur eva vastu-tattvāparijñānāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:791: tasmāt karma-vikarmākarmaṇāṃ tattvam īdṛśaṃ jñātvā vikarmākarmaṇī parityajya kartṛtvābhimāna-phalābhisandhi-hānena vihitaṃ karmaiva kurv ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:792: aparā vyākhyā karmaṇi jñāna-karmaṇi dṛśye jaḍe sad-rūpeṇa sphuraṇa-rūpeṇa cānusyūtaṃ sarva-bhramādhiṣṭhānam akarmāvedyaṃ sva-prakāśa-caitanyaṃ paramārtha-dṛṣṭyā yaḥ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:793: tathākarmaṇi ca sva-prakāśe dṛg-vastuni kalpitaṃ karma dṛśyaṃ māyā-mayaṃ na paramārtha-sat /
GE07bhg4c04u:795: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmany evānupaśyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:798: evaṃ parasparādhyāse 'pi śuddhaṃ vastu yaḥ paśyati manuṣyeṣu madhye sa eva buddhimān nānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:801: ataḥ sa evāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-sādhana-kṛtsna-karma-kṛd iti vāstava-dharmair eva stūyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:802: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api paramārtha-darśī bhava tāvataiva kṛtsna-karma-kāritvopapatter ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:803: ato yad uktaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhād iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:804: yac coktaṃ karmādīnāṃ tattvaṃ boddhavyam astīti sa buddhimān ity ādi-stutiś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:807: atattvaṃ cānyan na boddhavyaṃ na vā yaj-jñāne buddhimattvam iti yuktaiva paramārtha-darśināṃ vyākhyā /
GE07bhg4c04u:808: yat tu vyākhyānaṃ karmaṇi nitye parameśvarārthe 'nuṣṭhīyamāne bandha-hetutvābhāvād akarmedam iti yaḥ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:809: tathākarmaṇi ca nitya-karmākaraṇe pratyavāya-hetutvena karmedam iti yaḥ paśyet sa buddhimān ity ādi tad asaṅgatam eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:812: na caitādṛśaṃ mithyā-jñānaṃ boddhavyaṃ tattvaṃ nāpy etādṛśa-jñāne buddhimattvādi-stuty-upapattir bhrāntitvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:813: nitya-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ hi svarūpato 'ntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāropayujyate na tatrākarma-buddhiḥ kutrāpy upayujyate śāstreṇa nāmādiṣu brahma-dṛṣṭivad avihitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:815: evaṃ nitya-karmākaraṇam api svarūpato nitya-karma-viruddha-karma-lakṣakatayopayujyate na tu
GE07bhg4c04u:820: bhāvārthāḥ karma-śabdās tebhyaḥ kriyā pratīyetaiṣa hy artho vidhīyata iti nyāyena bhāvārthasyaivāpūrva-janakatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:821: atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ na gṛhṇāti ity ādāv api saṅkalpa-viśeṣasyaivāpūrva-janakatvābhyupagamāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:823: ato nitya-karmānuṣṭhānārhe kāle tad-viruddhatayā yad-upaveśanādi karma tad eva nitya-karmākaraṇopalakṣitaṃ pratyavāya-hetur iti vaidikānāṃ siddhāntaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:824: ataevākurvan vihitaṃ karmety atra lakṣaṇārthe śatā vyākhyātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:825: lakṣaṇa-hetvoḥ kriyāyā ity aviśeṣa-smaraṇe 'py atra hetutvānupapatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:828: nāpi nityānuṣṭhāna-param evaitad vākyaṃ nityāni kuryād ity arthe karmaṇy akarma yaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:829: paśyed ity ādi tad-abodhakaraṃ vākyaṃ prayuñjānasya bhagavataḥ pratārakatvāpatter
GE07bhg4c04u:830: ity ādi bhāṣya eva vistareṇa vyākhyātam ity uparamyate //18 //
GE07bhg4c04u:833: śuddhāntaḥ-karaṇasya jñānavattve 'pi janakāder ivākṛta-sannyāsasya karmaṇy anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāma-karma-yoge akarma /
GE07bhg4c04u:834: karmedaṃ na bhavatīti yaḥ paśyet tat-karmaṇo bandhakatvābhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:835: tathāśuddhāntaḥkaraṇasya jñānābhāve 'pi śāstrajñatvāt jñāna-vāvadūkasya sannyāsino 'karmaṇi karmākaraṇe karma paśyet durgati-prāpakaṃ karma-bandham evopalabhate /
GE07bhg4c04u:838: na tu tasya jñāna-vāvadūkasya jñāni-māninaḥ saṅgenāpi tad-vacasāpi sannyāsaṃ na karotīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:842: surān ātmānam ātma-sthaṃ nihnute māṃ ca dharma-hā /
GE07bhg4c04u:844: baladevaḥ : karmākarmaṇor boddhavyaṃ svarūpam āha karmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:845: anuṣṭhīyamāne niṣkāme karmaṇi yo 'karma prastutatvāt karmaṇy ātma-jñānaṃ paśyet,
GE07bhg4c04u:847: etad uktaṃ bhavati - yo mumukṣur hṛd-viśuddhaye kriyamāṇaṃ karmātma-jñānānusandhi-garbhatvāj jñānākāraṃ,
GE07bhg4c04u:848: tac ca jñānaṃ karma-dvārakatvāt karmākāraṃ paśyet /
GE07bhg4c04u:849: ubhayor ekātmoddeśyatvād ubhayam ekaṃ vidyād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:850: evam eva vakṣyate sāṅkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ ity ādineti /
GE07bhg4c04u:851: evam anuṣṭhīyamāne karmaṇi ātma-yāthātmyaṃ yo 'nusandhatte sa manuṣyeṣu buddhimān paṇḍitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:857: śrīdharaḥ : karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed ity anena śruty-arthārthāpattibhyāṃ yad uktam artha-dvandvaṃ tad eva spaṣṭayati yasyeti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:860: tat-saṅkalpena varjitā yasya bhavanti taṃ paṇḍitam āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:861: tatra hetur yatas taiḥ samārambhaiḥ śuddhe citte sati jātena jñānāgninā dagdhāny akarmatāṃ nītāni karmāṇi yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c04u:863: tad-artham idaṃ kartavyam iti kartavya-viṣayaḥ saṅkalpaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:867: tad etat paramārtha-darśinaḥ kartṛtvābhimānābhāvena karmāliptatvaṃ prapañcyate yasya sarva ity ādi brahma-karma-samādhinety antena /
GE07bhg4c04u:868: yasya pūrvokta-paramārtha-darśinaḥ sarve yāvanto vaidikā laukikā vā samārambhāḥ samārabhyanta
GE07bhg4c04u:869: iti vyutpattyā karmāṇi kāma-saṅkalpa-varjitāḥ kāmaḥ phala-tṛṣṇā saṅkalpo 'haṃ karomīti

GE07bhg4c04u:872: taṃ karmādāv akarmādi-darśanaṃ jñānaṃ tad evāgnis tena dagdhāni śubhāśubha-lakṣaṇāni
