GE07bhg4c04u:1106: sarva-yajñopāya-prāpyatvāt sarva-yajñebhyaḥ śreṣṭham ity evaṃ stotum adhikāri-bhedena
GE07bhg4c04u:1107: jñānopāya-bhūtān bahūn yajñān āha daivam ity ādibhir aṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1110: taṃ daivam eva yajñam apare karma-yoginaḥ paryupāsate śraddhayānutiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1111: apare tu jñāna-yogino brahma-rūpe 'gnau apare yajñenaivopāyena brahmārpaṇam ity ādy ukta-prakāreṇa yajñam upajuhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1115: adhunā samyag-darśanasya yajña-rūpatvena stāvakatayā brahmārpaṇa-mantre sthite punar api tasya stuty-artham itarāny ajñān upanyasyati daivam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1116: devā indrāgny-ādaya ijyante yena sa daivas tam eva yajñaṃ darśa-pūrṇamāsa-jyotiṣṭomādi-rūpam apare yoginaḥ paryupāsate sarvadā kurvanti na jñāna-yajñam
GE07bhg4c04u:1117: evaṃ karma-yajñam uktvāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tat-phala-bhūtaṃ jñāna-yajñam āha
GE07bhg4c04u:1119: tasminn agnau yajñaṃ pratyag ātmānaṃ tva-padārthaṃ yajñenaiva /
GE07bhg4c04u:1126: jīva-brahmābheda-darśanaṃ yajñatvena sampādya tat-sādhana-yajña-madhye paṭhyate śreyān dravya-mayād yajñāj jñāna-yajñaa ity ādinā stotum //25//
GE07bhg4c04u:1129: tāṃs tvaṃ śṛṇv ity āha daivam evety aṣṭabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1130: devā indra-varuṇādaya ijyante yasmin taṃ daivam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1134: apare jñāna-yoginas tu brahma paramātmaivāgnis tasmiṃs tat-padārthe yajñaṃ haviḥ-sthānīyaṃ tvaṃ-padārthaṃ jīvaṃ yajñena praṇava-rūpeṇa mantreṇaiva juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1136: atra yajñaṃ yajñena iti śabdau karma-karaṇa-sādhanau prathamātiśayoktyā śuddha-jīva-praṇavāvāhatuḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c04u:1137: baladevaḥ : evaṃ brahmānusandhi-garbhatayā ca karmaṇo jñānākāratāṃ nirūpya karma-yoga-bhedān āha daivam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1138: daivam indrādi-devārcana-rūpaṃ yajñam apare yoginaḥ paryupāsate tatraiva niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1139: apare brahmārpaṇaṃ ity ādi-nyāyena brahma-bhūtāgnāv yajñena sruvādinā yajñaṃ ghṛtādi-havī-rūpaṃ juhvati homa eva niṣṭhāṃ kurvatīty arthaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c04u:1144: anye naiṣṭhikī brahmacāriṇas tat-tad-indriya-saṃyama-rūpeṣv agniṣu śrotrādīni juhvati pravilāpayanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1148: viṣaya-bhoga-samaye 'py anāsaktāḥ santo 'gnitvena bhāviteṣv indriyeṣu haviṣṭvena bhāvitān śabdādīn prakṣipantīty arthaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c04u:1150: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye saṃyamāgniṣu juhvati śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juhvati //26//
GE07bhg4c04u:1153: saṃyamaḥ saṃyataṃ mana evāgnayas teṣu juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1155: anye tato nyūnā brahmacāriṇaḥ śabdādīn viṣayāni indriyāgniṣv indriyāṇy evāgnayas teṣu juhvati śabdādīnīndriyeṣu pravilāpayantīty arthaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c04u:1156: baladevaḥ : śrotrādīnīty anye naiṣṭhika-brahmacāriṇaḥ saṃyamāgniṣu tat-tad-ndriya-saṃyama-rūpeṣv agniṣu śrotrādīni juhvati tāni nirudhya saṃyama-pradhānās tiṣṭhanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1157: anye gṛhiṇa indriyāgniṣv agnitvena bhāviteṣu śrotrādiṣu śabdādīn upajuhvati anāsaktyā tān bhuñjānās tāni tat-pravaṇāni kurvanti //26//
GE07bhg4c04u:1171: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1173: na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ //
GE07bhg4c04u:1179: tasmin jñānena dhyeya-viṣayeṇa dīpite prajvalite dhyeyaṃ samyag jñātvā tasmin manaḥ saṃyamya tāni sarvāṇi karmāṇy uparamayantīty arthaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c04u:1182: sarvāṇīndriyāṇi tat-karmāṇi śravaṇa-darśanāni sarvāṇīndriya-karmāṇi prāṇa-karmāṇi cāpare ātma-saṃyama-yogāgnau juhvati jñāna-dīpite //27//
GE07bhg4c04u:1192: udgāre nāga ākhyātaḥ kūrmas tūnmīlane smṛtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1194: na jahāti mṛte kvāpi sarvavyāpī dhanaṃjayaḥ //
GE07bhg4c04u:1197: ātmanas tvaṃ-padārthasya saṃyamaḥ śuddhir evāgnis tasmin juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1200: nānye mana ādāya iti bhāvayantīty arthaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c04u:1202: apare indriya-karmāṇi prāṇa-karmāṇi cātma-saṃyama-yogāgnau ca juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1203: ātmano manasaḥ saṃyamaḥ sa eva yogas tasminn agnitvena bhāvite juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1204: manasā indriyāṇāṃ prāṇānāṃ ca karma-pravaṇatāṃ nivārayituṃ prayatante /
GE07bhg4c04u:1205: indriyāṇāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ karmāṇi śabda-grahaṇādīni prāṇa-karmāṇi prāṇasya bahir-gamanaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c04u:1209: udānasyordhva-nayanaṃ cety evaṃ bodhyāni sarvāṇi sāmastyena jñāna-dīpite ātmānusandhānojjvalite //27//
GE07bhg4c04u:1214: dravya-dānam eva yajño yeṣāṃ te dravya-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1215: kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādi tapa eva yajño yeṣāṃ te eva yajño yeṣāṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1216: yogo 'ṣṭāṅga eva yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1217: svādhyāyena vedena śravaṇa-mananādinā yat tad artha-jñānaṃ tad eva yajño yeṣāṃ te svādhyāya-jñāna-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1218: yad vā veda-pāṭha-yajñās tad-artha-jñāna-yajñāś ceti dvividhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1220: samyak śitaṃ tīkṣṇīkṛtaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te //28//
GE07bhg4c04u:1222: dravya-yajñās tapo-yajñā yoga-yajñās tathāpare svādhyāya-jñāna-yajñāś ca yatayaḥ saṃśita-vratāḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c04u:1224: dravya-dānam eva yajño yeṣāṃ te dravya-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1225: tapaḥ kṛcchra-cāndrāyaṇādy eva yajño yeṣāṃ te tapo-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1226: yogo 'ṣṭāṅga eva yajño yeṣāṃ te yoga-yajñāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1227: svādhyāyo vedasya pāṭhas tad-arthasya jñānaṃ ca yajño yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c04u:1229: sarva ete samyak śitaṃ tīkṣṇīkṛtaṃ vrataṃ yeṣāṃ te //28//
GE07bhg4c04u:1242: tathā kumbhakena prāṇāpānayor ūrdhvādho-gatī ruddhvā recaka-kāle 'pānaṃ prāṇe juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1243: evaṃ pūraka-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇā apara ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1245: apare tv āhāra-saṅkocam abhyasyantaḥ svayam eva jīryamāṇeṣv indriyeṣu tat-tad-indriya-vṛtti-layaṃ bhāvayantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1246: yad vā - apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpara ity anena pūraka-recakayor āvartamānayor
GE07bhg4c04u:1247: haṃsaḥ so 'ham ity anulomataḥ pratilomataś ca abhivyajyamānenājapā-mantreṇa tat-ttvaṃ-padārthaikyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1250: sa-kāreṇa bahir yāti haṃ-kāreṇa viśet punaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1251: prāṇas tatra sa evāhaṃ haṃsa ity anucintayet // iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1252: prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvety anena tu ślokena prāṇāyāma-yajñā aparaiḥ kathyante /
GE07bhg4c04u:1253: tatrāyam arthaḥ - dvau bhāgau pūrayed annair jalenaikaṃ prapūrayet /
GE07bhg4c04u:1255: evam ādi-vacanokto niyata āhāro yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c04u:1256: kumbhakena prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇāḥ santaḥ prāṇān indriyāṇi prāṇeṣu juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1257: kumbhake hi sarve prāṇā ekībhavantīti tatraiva layamāneṣv indriyeṣu homaṃ bhāvayantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1259: yathā yathā sadābhyāsān manasaḥ sthiratā bhavet /
GE07bhg4c04u:1260: vāyu-vāk-kāya-dṛṣṭīnāṃ sthiratā ca tathā tathā // iti //29//
GE07bhg4c04u:1262: apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpare prāṇāpāna-gatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇāḥ //29//
GE07bhg4c04u:1264: apare prāṇāyāma-niṣṭhāḥ apāne 'dho-vṛttau prāṇam ūrdhva-vṛttaṃ juhvati pūraka-kāle prāṇam apānenaikīkurvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1266: kumbhaka-kāle prāṇāpānayor gatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāma-parāyaṇā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1268: niyatāhārā alpāhārāḥ prāṇeṣv āhāra-saṅkocanenaiva jīvyamāneṣu prāṇān indriyāṇi juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1269: indriyāṇāṃ prāṇādhīna-vṛttitvāt prāṇa-daurbalye sati svayam eva sva-sva-viṣaya-grahaṇāsamarthānīndriyāṇi prāṇeṣv evālpīyanta ity arthaḥ //29//
GE07bhg4c04u:1271: tathāpare prāṇāyāma- parāyaṇās te tridhā adho-vṛttāv apāne prāṇam ūrdhva-vṛttiṃ juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1273: tathā prāṇe 'pānaṃ juhvati recakenāpānaṃ prāṇena sahaikīkṛtya bahir nirgamayanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1274: yathā prāṇāpānayor gatī śvāsa-praśvāsau kumbhakena ruddhvā vartanta iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1275: āntarasya vāyor nāsāsyena bahir nirgamaḥ śvāsaḥ prāṇasya gatiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1277: tayor nirodhaḥ kumbhakaḥ sa dvividhaḥ vāyum āpūrya śvāsa-praśvāsayor nirodho 'ntaḥ-kumbhakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1278: vāyuṃ virecya tayor nirodho bhaiḥ kumbhakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1279: apare nityatāhārāḥ bhojana-saṅkocaam abhyasyantaḥ prāṇān indriyāṇi prāṇeṣu juhvati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1280: teṣv alpāhāreṇa jīryamāṇeṣu tad-āyatta-vṛttikāni tāni viṣaya-grahaṇākṣamāṇi
GE07bhg4c04u:1285: śrīdharaḥ : tad evam uktānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ yajña-vidāṃ phalam āha sarve 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1288: yajñaiḥ kṣayitaṃ nāśitaṃ kalmaṣaṃ yais te //30//
GE07bhg4c04u:1290: tad evam uktānāṃ dvādaśadhā yajña-vidāṃ phalam āha sarve 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1291: yajñān vidanti jānanti vindanti labhante veti yajña-vido yajñānāṃ jñātāraḥ kartāraś ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:1292: yajñaiḥ pūrvoktaiḥ kṣapitaṃ nāśitaṃ kalmaṣaṃ pāpaṃ yeṣāṃ te yajña-kṣapita-kalmaṣāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1293: yajñān kṛtvāvaśiṣṭe kāle 'nnam amṛta-śabda-vācyaṃ bhuñjata iti yajña-śiṣṭāmṛta-bhujaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1294: te sarve 'pi sattva-śuddhi-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇa yānti brahma sanātanaṃ nityaṃ saṃsārān mucyanta ity arthaḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c04u:1296: sarve 'py ete yajña-vida ukta-lakṣaṇān yajñān vindamānāḥ santo jñāna-dvārā brahma yānti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1297: atrānanusaṃhitaṃ phalam āha yajña-śiṣṭaṃ yajñāvaśiṣṭaṃ yad amṛtaṃ bhogaiśvarya-siddhy-ādikaṃ tad bhuñjata iti //30//
GE07bhg4c04u:1298: baladevaḥ : ete khalv indirya-vijaya-kāmāḥ sarve 'pīti yajña-vidaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1299: pūrvoktān devādi-yajñān vindamānā tair eva yajñaiḥ kṣapita-kalmaṣāḥ //30//
GE07bhg4c04u:1304: yajñān kṛtvā avaśiṣṭe kāle 'niṣiddham annam amṛta-rūpaṃ bhuñjata iti tathā /
GE07bhg4c04u:1305: te sanātanaṃ nityaṃ brahma jñāna-dvāreṇa prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1309: ato yajñāḥ sarvathā kartavyā ity arthaḥ //31//
GE07bhg4c04u:1311: evam anvaye guṇam uktvā vyatireke doṣam āha yejñety ardhena /
GE07bhg4c04u:1312: uktānāṃ yajñānāṃ madhye 'nyatamo 'pi yajño yasya nāsti so 'yajñas tasyāyam alpa-sukho 'pi manuṣya-loko nāsti sarva-nindyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:1318: kuto 'nyo devādi-lokas tena prāptavya ity arthaḥ //31//
GE07bhg4c04u:1320: yajña-śiṣṭaṃ yad amṛtam annādi bhogaiśvarya-siddhy-ādi ca tad-bhuñjānāḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1324: evaṃ bahu-vidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe /
GE07bhg4c04u:1325: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase //32//
GE07bhg4c04u:1326: śrīdharaḥ : jñāna-yajñaṃ stotum uktān yajñān upasaṃharati evaṃ bahu-vidhā iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1329: tathāpi tān sarvān vāṅ-manaḥ-kāya-karma-janitān ātma-svarūpa-saṃsparśa-rahitān viddhi jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1331: evaṃ jñātvā jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ san saṃsārād vimukto bhaviṣyasi //32//
GE07bhg4c04u:1333: kiṃ tvayā svotprekṣā-mātreṇaivam ucyate na hi veda evātra pramāṇam ity āha evam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1334: evaṃ yathoktā bahu-vidhā bahu-prakārā yajñāḥ sarva-vaidika-śreyaḥ-sādhana-rūpā vitatā vistṛtā brahmaṇo vedasya mukhe dvāre veda-dvāreṇaivaite 'vagatā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1336: karmajān kāyika-vācika-mānasa-karmodbhavān viddhi jānīhi tān sarvān yajñān nātmajān /
GE07bhg4c04u:1337: nirvyāpāro hy ātmā na tad-vyāpārā ete kintu nirvyāpāro 'ham udāsīna ity evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase 'smāt saṃsāra-bandhanād iti śeṣaḥ //32//
GE07bhg4c04u:1339: brahmaṇo vedasya mukhena vedena svamukhenaiva spaṣṭam uktā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1345: evaṃ jñātvā tad-upāyatayā tenoktān tān avabudhyānuṣṭhāya tad-utpanna-vijñānenāvalokitātma-dvayaḥ saṃsārād vimokṣyase //32//
GE07bhg4c04u:1349: śrīdharaḥ : karma-yajñāj jñāna-yajñas tu śreṣṭha ity āha śreyān iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1350: dravya-mayād anātma-vyāpāra-janyād daivādi-yajñāj jñāna-yajñaḥ śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1351: yadyapi jñāna-yajñasyāpi mano-vyāpārādhīnatvam asty eva tathāpy ātma-svarūpasya jñānasya manaḥ-pariṇāme 'bhivyakti-mātram /
GE07bhg4c04u:1353: śreṣṭhatve hetuḥ -- sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ phala-sahitaṃ jñāne parisamāpyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1355: sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃ ca prajāḥ sādhu kurvantīti śruteḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c04u:1357: sarveṣāṃ tulyavan nirdeśātma-karma-jñānayoḥ sāmya-prāptāv āha śreyān iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1359: dravya-mayāt tad-upalakṣitāj jñāna-śūnyāt sarvasmād api yajñāt saṃsāra-phalāj jñāna-yajña eka eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:1362: yasmāt sarvaṃ karmeṣṭi-paśu-soma-cayana-rūpaṃ śrautam akhilaṃ niravaśeṣaṃ smārtam
GE07bhg4c04u:1363: upāsanādi-rūpaṃ ca yat karma taj-jñāne brahmātmaikya-sākṣātkāre samāpyate pratibandha-kṣaya-dvāreṇa paryavasyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1364: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dāne tapasānāśakena iti dharmena pāpam apanudati iti ca śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1365: sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādi-śruter aśvavat [Vs. 3.4.26] iti nyāyāc cety arthaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c04u:1367: teṣāṃ madhye brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma-havir iti lakṣaṇād api dravya-mayād yajñād brahmāgnāv ity anenokto jñāna-yajñaḥ śreyān /
GE07bhg4c04u:1368: kutaḥ ? jñāne sati sarvaṃ karmākhilam avyarthaṃ sat parisamāpyate samāptībhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1370: baladevaḥ : uktāḥ karma-yogā viviktātmānusandhi-garbhatvād araṇyād iva ubhaya-rūpās teṣu jñāna-rūpaṃ saṃstauti śreyān iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1371: dvirūpe karmaṇi karma-dravya-bhayād aṃśāj jñāna-mayo 'ṃśaḥ śreyān praśastaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1372: dravya-mayād ity upalakṣaṇām indirya-saṃyamādīnāṃ teṣāṃ tad-upāyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:1374: jñāne sati sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ sāṅgaṃ parisamāpyate nivṛttim eti phale jāte sādhana-nivṛtter darśanāt //33//
GE07bhg4c04u:1378: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtātma-jñāne sādhanam āha tad iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1379: tad taj jñānaṃ viddhi jānīhi prāpnuhīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1390: etādṛśa-jñāna-prāptau ko 'tipratyāsanna upāya ity ucyate tad viddhīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1391: tat-sarva-karma-phala-bhūtaṃ jñānaṃ viddhi labhasva ācāryānabhigamya teṣāṃ praṇipātena
GE07bhg4c04u:1392: prakarṣeṇa nīcaiḥ patanaṃ praṇipāto dīrgha-namaskāras tena ko 'haṃ kathaṃ baddho
GE07bhg4c04u:1393: 'smi kenopāyena mucyeyam ity ādi paripraśnena bahu-viṣayeṇa praśnena /
GE07bhg4c04u:1396: sampādayiṣyanti te tubhyaṃ jñānaṃ paramātma-viṣayaṃ sākṣān mokṣa-phalaṃ jñāninaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1398: sākṣātkāravadbhir upadiṣṭam eva jñānaṃ phala-paryavasāyi na tu tad-rahitaiḥ pada-vākya-nyāyādimāna-nipuṇair apīti bhagavato
GE07bhg4c04u:1399: matam / tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham iti śruti-saṃvādi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1400: tatrāpi śrotriyam adhīta-vedaṃ brahma-niṣṭhaṃ kṛta-brahma-sākṣātkāram iti vyākhyānāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:1401: bahu-vacanaṃ cedam ācārya-viṣayam ekasminn api gauravātiśayārthaṃ na tu bahutva-vivakṣayā /
GE07bhg4c04u:1402: ekasmād eva tattva-sākṣātkāravata ācāryāt tattva-jñānodaye satyācāryāntara-gamanasya tad-artham ayogād iti draṣṭavyam //34//
GE07bhg4c04u:1411: tad vijñānārthaṃ sa gurum evābhigacchet samit-pāṇiḥ śrotriyaṃ brahma-niṣṭham iti śruteḥ //34//
GE07bhg4c04u:1412: baladevaḥ : evaṃ jīva-svarūpa-jñānaṃ tat-sādhanaṃ ca sāṅgam upadiśya para-svarūpopāsana-jñānam upadśan sat-prasaṅga-labhyatvaṃ tasyāha tad iti
GE07bhg4c04u:1413: yad arthaṃ tad ubhayaṃ mayā tavopadiṣṭaṃ avināśi tu tad viddhi [Gītā 2.17] ity ādinā
GE07bhg4c04u:1414: tat parātma-sambandhi-jñānaṃ praṇipātādibhiḥ prasāditebhyo jñānibhyaḥ sadbhyas tvam
GE07bhg4c04u:1419: nanūdāsīnās te na vakṣyantīti cet tatrāha upeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1420: te jñānino 'dhigata-svarūpātmānaḥ praṇipātādinā taj-jijñāsutām ālakṣya te tubhyaṃ
GE07bhg4c04u:1421: tādṛśāya tat-sambandhi jñānam upadekṣyanti tattva-darśinas taj-jñāna-pracārakāḥ kāruṇikā iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c04u:1422: nanv atra tad iti jīva-jñānaṃ vācyaṃ prakṛtatvād iti cen, na /
GE07bhg4c04u:1425: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā [Gītā 4.6] ity ādinā parātmano 'py aprākṛtatvāt /
GE07bhg4c04u:1426: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ - anyārthaś ca parāmarśaḥ [Vs. 1.3.20] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1427: anyathā śruti-sūtrārtha-saṃvādino 'grimasya jñāna-mahimno virodhaḥ syād uktam eva suṣṭhu //34//
GE07bhg4c04u:1429: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava /
GE07bhg4c04u:1430: yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi //35//
GE07bhg4c04u:1431: śrīdharaḥ : jñāna-phalam āha yaj jñātveti sārdhais tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1432: yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā prāpya punar bandhu-vadhādi-nimittaṃ moham na prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1433: tatra hetuḥ - yena jñānena bhūtāni pitāputrādīni svāvidyā-vijṛmbhitāni svātmany evābhedena drakṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1434: atho anantaram ātmānaṃ mayi paramātmany abhedena drakṣyasīty arthaḥ //35//
GE07bhg4c04u:1436: evam atinirbandhena jñānotpādane kiṃsyāt ata āha yaj jñātveti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1437: yat pūrvoktaṃ jñānam ācāryair upadiṣṭaṃ jñātvā prāpya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1440: na punar moham evaṃ bandhu-vadhādi-nimittaṃ bhramaṃ yāsyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1442: kasmād evaṃ yasmād eva jñānena bhūtāni pitṛ-putrādīni aśeṣeṇa brahmādi-stamba-paryantāni
GE07bhg4c04u:1443: svāvidyā-vijṛmbhitāni ātmani tvayi tvaṃ-padārthe 'tho api mayi bhagavati vāsudeve
GE07bhg4c04u:1446: māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevam ātmatvena sākṣātkṛtya sarvājñāna-nāśe tat-kāryāṇi bhūtāni na sthāsyantīti bhāvaḥ //35//
GE07bhg4c04u:1448: jñānasya phalam āha yaj jñātveti sārdhais tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1449: yaj jñānaṃ dehād atiikta evātmeti lakṣaṇaṃ jñātvaivaṃ moham antaḥ-karaṇa-dharmaṃ na prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1450: yena ca moha-vigamena svābhāvika-nitya-siddhātma-jñāna-lābhād aśeṣāṇi bhūtāni manuṣya-tiryag-ādīny ātmani jīvātmany upādhitvena sthitāni pṛthag drakṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1451: atho mayi parama-kāraṇe ca kāryatvena sthitāni drakṣyasi //35//
GE07bhg4c04u:1453: yaj-jīva-jñāna-pūrvakaṃ paramātma-sambandhi-jñānaṃ jñātvopalabhya punar evaṃ bandhu-vadhādi-hetukaṃ mohaṃ na yāsyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1455: yena jñānena bhūtāni deva-mānavādi-śarīrāṇi aśeṣeṇa sāmastyena sarvāṇīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1456: ātmani sva-svarūpe upādhitvena sthitāni tāni pṛthag drakṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c04u:1457: atho mayi sarveśvare sarva-hetau kāryatvena sthitāni tāni drakṣyasīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1458: etad uktaṃ bhavati - deha-dvaya-viviktā jīvātmānas teṣāṃ hari-vimukhānāṃ hari-māyayaiva deheṣu daihikteṣu ca mamatvāni racitāni /
GE07bhg4c04u:1461: paramātmā khalu sarveśvaraḥ svāśritānāṃ jīvānāṃ tat-tat-karmānuguṇatayā tat-tad-dehendriyāṇi tat-tad-deha-yātrāṃ lokāntareṣu
GE07bhg4c04u:1462: tat-tat-sukha-bhogāṃś ca sampādayaty upāsitas tu muktim ity eva jñānino na mohāvakāśa iti //35//
GE07bhg4c04u:1464: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpa-kṛttamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1466: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca api ced iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1467: sarvebhyaḥ pāpa-kāribhyo yadyapy atiśayena pāpa-kārī tvam asi,
GE07bhg4c04u:1468: tathāpi sarvaṃ pāpa-samudraṃ jñāna-plavenaiva jñāna-potenaiva samyag-anāyāsena tariṣyasi //36//
GE07bhg4c04u:1470: kiṃ ca śṛṇu jñānasya māhātmyam api ced iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1472: yadyapy ayam artho na sambhavaty eva,
GE07bhg4c04u:1474: yadyapi tvaṃ pāpa-kāribhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'py atiśayena pāpa-kārī pāpa-kṛttamaḥ syās
GE07bhg4c04u:1475: tathāpi sarvaṃ vṛjinaṃ pāpam atidustaratvenārṇava-sadṛśaṃ jñāna-plavenaiva nānyena
GE07bhg4c04u:1476: jñānam eva plavaṃ potaṃ kṛtvā santariṣyasi samyag anāyāsena punar āvṛtti-varjitatvena
GE07bhg4c04u:1478: vṛjina-śabdenātra dharmādharma-rūpaṃ karma saṃsāra-phalam abhipretaṃ mumukṣoḥ pāpavat puṇyasyāpy aniṣṭatvāt //36//
GE07bhg4c04u:1480: jñānasya māhātmyam āha api ced iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1481: pāpibhyaḥ pāpa-kṛdbhyo 'pi sakāśād yadyapy atiśayena pāpakārī tvam asi,
GE07bhg4c04u:1484: nāpy utpanna-jñānasyaitad durācāratvaṃ sambhaved ato 'tra vyākhyā śrī-madhusūdana-sarasvatī-pādānām - api ced ity asambhāvitābhyupagama-pradarśanārthau nipātau /
GE07bhg4c04u:1485: yadyapy ayam artho na sambhavaty eva,
GE07bhg4c04u:1487: baladevaḥ : jñāna-prabhāvam āha api ced iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1488: yadyapi sarvebhyaḥ pāpa-kartṛbhyas tvam atiśayena pāpa-kṛd asi,
GE07bhg4c04u:1489: tathāpi sarvaṃ vṛjinaṃ nikhilaṃ pāpaṃ dustaratvenārṇava-tulyam ukta-lakṣaṇa-jñāna-plavena santariṣyasi //36//
GE07bhg4c04u:1495: iti bhrāntiṃ dṛṣṭāntena vārayann āha yathaidhāṃsīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1496: edhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni pradīpto 'gnir yathā bhasmībhāvaṃ nayati tathātma-jñānam āpanno mumukṣuḥ kālena mahatātmani vindati labhata ity arthaḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c04u:1498: nanu samudravat taraṇe karmaṇāṃ nāśo na syād ity āśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntaram āha yathaidhāṃsīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1499: yathaidhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni samiddhaḥ prajvalito 'gnir bhasmasāt kurute bhasmībhāvaṃ nayati
GE07bhg4c04u:1500: he 'rjuna jñānāgniḥ sarva-karmāṇi pāpāni puṇyāni cāviśeṣeṇa prārabdha-phala-bhinnāni
GE07bhg4c04u:1501: bhasmasāt kurute tathā tat-kāraṇājñāna-vināśena vināśayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1504: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare // [MuṇḍU 2.2.8] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1506: itarasyāpy evam asaṃśleṣaḥ pāte tu [Vs. 4.1.13-14] iti ca sūtre /
GE07bhg4c04u:1507: anārabdhe puṇya-pāpe naśyata evety atra sūtram anārabdha-kārya eva tu pūrve tad-avadheḥ [Vs. 4.1.15] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1509: tasya tāvad eva ciraṃ yāvan na vimokṣye [ChāndU 6.14.2] iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1510: bhogena tv itare kṣapayitvā sampadyate [Vs. 4.1.19] iti sūtrāc ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:1511: ādhikārikāṇāṃ tu yāny eva jñānotpādaka-dehārambhakāṇi tāny eva dehāntarārambhakāṇy api /
GE07bhg4c04u:1513: tathā ca sūtraṃ yāvad-adhikāram avasthitir ādhikārikāṇām [Vs. 3.3.32] iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1518: bhogaś caikena dehenānekena veti na viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1521: śuddhāntaḥkaraṇasyotpannaṃ tu prārabdha-bhinnaṃ karma-mātraṃ vināśayatīti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1524: idānīṃ puṇya-karmāṇy api naśyantīty āha yatheti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1525: edhāṃsi kāṣṭhāni samiddhaḥ prajvalito 'gnir yathā bhasmasāt kurute,
GE07bhg4c04u:1526: tathā jñānāgniḥ sva-parātmānubhava-vahniḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi puṇyāni pāpāni ca prārabdhetarāṇi bhasmasāt kurute /
GE07bhg4c04u:1527: tatra sañcitāni prārabdhetarāṇīpīkatulavan nirdahati kriyamāṇāni padma-patrāmbu-binduvad
GE07bhg4c04u:1528: viśeṣayati prārabdhāni tu tat-prabhāvenātijīrṇāny api sat-patha-pracārārthayā harer
GE07bhg4c04u:1530: śrutiś ca -ubhe uhaivaiṣa ete taraty amṛtaḥ sādhvasādhunī iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1531: eṣa brahmānubhavī ubhe saṃcitya kriyamāṇe ete sādhvasādhunī puṇya-pāpe karmaṇī tarati krāmatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1532: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvārdhayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśāt
GE07bhg4c04u:1535: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1537: śrīdharaḥ : tatra hetum āha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1539: iha tapo-yogādiṣu madhye jñāna-tulyaṃ nāsty eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:1540: tarhi sarve 'pi kim ity ātma-jñānam eva nābhyasanta iti ?
GE07bhg4c04u:1541: ata āha tat svayam iti sārdhena /
GE07bhg4c04u:1542: tad ātmani viṣaye jñānaṃ kālena mahatā karma-yogena saṃsiddho yogyatāṃ prāptaḥ san svayam evānāyāsena labhate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1546: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram pāvanaṃ śuddhi-karam anyad iha vede loka-vyavahāre vā vidyate,
GE07bhg4c04u:1547: jñāna-bhinnasya ajñānānivartakatvena samūla-pāpa-nivartakatvābhāvāt kāraṇa-sad-bhāvena punaḥ pāpodayāc ca /
GE07bhg4c04u:1548: jñānena tv ajñāna-nivṛttyā samūla-pāpa-nivṛttir iti tat-samam anyac ca vidyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1549: tad ātma-viṣayaṃ jñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ kim iti jhaṭiti notpadyate ?
GE07bhg4c04u:1550: tatrāha taj jñānaṃ kālena mahatā yoga-saṃsiddho yogena pūrvokta-karma-yogena saṃsiddhaḥ
GE07bhg4c04u:1551: saṃskṛto yogyatām āpannaḥ svayam ātmany antaḥ-karaṇe vindati labhate na tu yogayatām
GE07bhg4c04u:1552: āpanno 'nya-dattaṃ sva-niṣṭhatayā na vā para-niṣṭhaṃ svīyatayā vindatīty arthaḥ //38 //
GE07bhg4c04u:1554: iha tapo-yogādi-yukteṣu madhye jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitraṃ kim api nāsti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1556: kintu yogena niṣkāma-karma-yogena samyak siddha eva,
GE07bhg4c04u:1563: hi yato jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitraṃ śuddhi-karaṃ tapas tīrthāṭanādikaṃ nāsti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1564: atas tat sarva-pāpa-nāśakaṃ taj jñānaṃ na sarva-sulabhaṃ,
GE07bhg4c04u:1565: kintu yogena niṣkāma-karmaṇā saṃsiddhaḥ paripakva eva kālenaiva,
GE07bhg4c04u:1578: ataḥ śraddhādi-sampattyā jñāna-lābhāt prāk karma-yoga eva śuddhy-artham anuṣṭheyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1579: jñāna-lābhānantaraṃ tu na tasya kiṃcit kartavyam ity āha jñānaṃ labdhvā tu mokṣam acireṇa prāpnoti //39//
GE07bhg4c04u:1581: yenaikāntena jñāna-prāptir bhavati sa upāyaḥ pūrvokta-praṇipātādy-apekṣayāpy āsannatara ucyate śraddhāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1582: guru-vedānta-vākyeṣv idam ittham veti pramā-rūpāstikya-buddhiḥ śraddhā tadvān puruṣo labhate jñānam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1583: etādṛśo 'pi kaścid alasaḥ syāt tatrāha tat-paraḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1585: śraddhāvāṃs tat-paro 'pi kaścid ajitendriyaḥ syād ata āha saṃyatendriyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1586: saṃyatāni viṣayebhyo nivartitānīndriyāṇi yena sa saṃyatendriyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1587: ya evaṃ viśeṣaṇa-traya-yuktaḥ so 'vaśyaṃ jñānaṃ labhate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1589: śraddhāvattvādis tv aikāntika upāya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1590: īdṛśenopāyena jñānaṃ labdhvā parāṃ caramāṃ śāntim avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛtti-rūpāṃ muktim acireṇa tad-avyavadhānenaivādhigacchati labhate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1591: yathā hi dīpaḥ svotpatti-mātreṇaivāndhakāra-nivṛttiṃ karoti na tu kaṃcit sahakāriṇam
GE07bhg4c04u:1592: apekṣate tathā jñānam api svotpatti-mātreṇaivājñāna-nivṛttiṃ karoti na tu kiṃcit
GE07bhg4c04u:1595: tarhi kīdṛśaḥ san kadā prāpnotīty ata āha śraddhāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1596: śraddhā niṣkāma-karmaṇaivāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhyaiva jñānaṃ syād iti śāstrārthaṃ āstikya-buddhis tadvān eva /
GE07bhg4c04u:1597: tat-paras tad-anuṣṭhāna-niṣṭhas tādṛśo 'pi yadā saṃyatendriyaḥ syāt tadā parāṃ śāntim saṃsāra-nāśam //39//
GE07bhg4c04u:1598: baladevaḥ : kīdṛśaḥ san kadā vindatīty āha śraddhāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1599: niṣkāmena karmaṇā hṛd-viśuddhau jñānaṃ syād iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1601: tat-paras tad-anuṣṭhāna-niṣṭhas tādṛg api yadā saṃyatendriyas tadā parāṃ śāntim muktim //39//
GE07bhg4c04u:1604: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1605: śrīdharaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇam uktvā tad-viparītam anadhikāriṇam āha ajñaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1608: jātāyām api śraddhāyāṃ mamedaṃ siddhen na veti aṃśayākrānta-cittaś ca vinaśyate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1610: eteṣu triṣv api saṃśayātmā sarvathā naśyati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1613: na ca sukhaṃ saṃśayenaaiva bhogasyāpy asambhavāt //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1618: guru-vedānta-vākyārtha idam evaṃ na bhavaty eveti viparyaya-rūpā nāstikya-buddhir aśraddhā tadvān aśraddadhānaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1619: idam evaṃ bhavati na veti sarvatra saṃśayākrānta-cittaḥ saṃśayātmā vinaśyati svārthād bhraṣṭo bhavati /
GE07bhg4c04u:1620: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca vinaśyatīti saṃśayātmāpekṣayā nyūnatva-kathanārthaṃ cakārābhyāṃ tayoḥ prayogaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1621: kutaḥ ? saṃśayātmā hi sarvataḥ pāpīyān yato nāyaṃ manuṣya-loko 'sti vittārjanādy-abhāvāt,
GE07bhg4c04u:1623: na sukhaṃ bhojanādi-kṛtaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ sarvatra sandehākrānta-cittasya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1624: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca paro loko nāsti manuṣya-loko bhojanādi-sukhaṃ ca vartate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1626: tu tritaya-hīnatvena sarvataḥ pāpīyān ity arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1628: jñānādhikāriṇam uktvā tad-viparītādhikāriṇam āha ajñaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1630: aśraddadhānaḥ śāstra-jñānavattve 'pi nānā-vādināṃ paraspara-vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā na kvāpi viśvastaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1631: śraddhāvattve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat sidhyen na veti sandehākrānt-matiḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1632: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ viśeṣato nindati nāyam iti //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1633: baladevaḥ : jñānādhikāriṇaṃ tat-phalaṃ cābhidhāya tad-viparītaṃ tat-phalaṃ cāha ajñaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1635: aśraddadhānaḥ śāstra-jñāne saty api vivādi-pratipattibhir na kvāpi viśvastaḥ,
GE07bhg4c04u:1636: śraddadhānatve 'pi saṃśayātmā mamaitat siddhyen na veti sandihāna-manā vinaśyati svārthād vicyavate /
GE07bhg4c04u:1637: teṣv api madhye saṃśayātmānaṃ vinindati nāyam iti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1638: ayaṃ prākṛto lokaḥ paro 'prākṛtaḥ saṃśayātmanaḥ kiṃcid api sukhaṃ nāsti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1641: tatra sandihānasya kutas tad ity arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c04u:1645: śrīdharaḥ : adhyāya-dvayoktāṃ pūrvāpara-bhūmikā-bhedena karma-jñāna-mayīṃ dvividhāṃ brahma-niṣṭhām upasaṃharati yogeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c04u:1646: yogena parameśvarārādhana-rūpeṇa tasmin saṃnyastāni karmāṇi yena taṃ karmāṇi sva-phalair na nibadhnanti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1647: tataś ca jñānena ātma-bodhena kartrā saṃchinnaḥ saṃsāro dehādy-atimāna-lakṣaṇo yasya tam ātmavantam apramādinaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni svātāvikāni vā na nibadhnanti //41//
GE07bhg4c04u:1649: etādṛśaysya sarvānartha-mūlasya saṃśayasya nirākaraṇāyātma-niścayam upāyaṃ vadann
GE07bhg4c04u:1652: yogena bhagavad-ārādhana-lakṣaṇa-samatva-buddhi-rūpeṇa saṃnyastāni bhagavati samarpitāni karmāṇi yena /
GE07bhg4c04u:1653: yad vā paramārtha-darśana-lakṣaṇena yogena saṃnyastāni tyaktāni karmāṇi yena taṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1654: saṃśaye sati kathaṃ yoga-saṃnyasta-karmatvam ata āha jñāna-saṃchinna-saṃśayaṃ jñānenātma-niścaya-lakṣaṇena cchinnaḥ saṃśayo yena tam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1655: viṣaya-para-vaśatva-svarūpa-prasāde sati kuto jñānotpattir ity ata āha ātmavantam apramādinaṃ sarvadā sāvadhānam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1657: yoga-saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ karmāṇi loka-saṅgrahārthāni vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpāṇi vā na nibadhnanti aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ vā śarīraṃ nārabhante he dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhg4c04u:1659: naiṣkarmyaṃ tv etādṛśasya syād ity āha yogān niṣkāma-karma-yogānantaram eva saṃnyasta-karmāṇaṃ saṃnyāsena tyakta-karmāṇam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1662: baladevaḥ : īdṛśasya naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇā siddhiḥ syād ity āha yogeti /
GE07bhg4c04u:1663: yogena yoga-sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi ity atroktena saṃnyastāni jñānākāratāpannāni karmāṇi yasya tam /
GE07bhg4c04u:1671: yasmād evaṃ tasmād ātmano 'jñānena saṃbhūtaṃ hṛdi-sthitam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ śokādi-nimittaṃ dehātma-viveka-khaḍgena chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1673: he bhārateti kṣatriyatvena yuddhasya dharmatvaṃ darśitam //42//
GE07bhg4c04u:1675: niṣṭhoktā yena taṃ vande śauriṃ saṃśaya-saṃchidam //
GE07bhg4c04u:1679: tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ hṛt-sthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata //42//
GE07bhg4c04u:1684: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gataṃ saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogam ātiṣṭhāśraya /
GE07bhg4c04u:1689: gītāsv ayaṃ caturtho hi saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām //4//
GE07bhg4c04u:1691: hṛt-sthaṃ hṛd-gatam ātma-viṣayakaṃ saṃśayaṃ mad-upadiṣṭena jñānāsinā chittvā yogaṃ niṣkāmaṃ karma mayopadiṣṭam ātiṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c04u:1693: dvy-aṃśakaṃ dhānyavat karma tuṣāṃśād iva taṇḍulaḥ /
GE07bhg4c04u:1694: śreṣṭhaṃ dravyāṃśato jñānam iti turyasya nirṇayaḥ //4//
